monster.name: Abyssal Wretch
idiomes: understands Abyssal però no pot parlar

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The kruthik has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The kruthik té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de kruthik's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

trait.name: Tuneladora
entries: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kruthik makes two stab attacks or two spike attacks.

action.name: Stab
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Spike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Adult Oblex
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (blind beyond this distance)

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The oblex és Intel·ligència ({@dc 15} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Amorf
entries: The oblex pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

trait.name: Aversion to Fire
entries: Si the oblex rep dany de foc té desavantatge a tirades d'impactar i d'habilitat fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Sulfurous Impersonation
entries: Com a acció bonus, the oblex can extrude a piece of itself that assumes the appearance of one Medium or smaller creature whose memories it has stolen. This simulacrum appears, feels, and sounds exactly like the creature it impersonates, though it smells faintly of sulfur. The oblex can impersonate {@dice 1d4 + 1} different creatures, each one tethered to its body by a strand of slime that can extend up to 120 feet away. For all practical purposes, the simulacrum is the oblex, meaning that the oblex occupies its space and the simulacrum's space simultaneously. The slimy tether is immune to damage, but it is severed if there is no opening at least 1 inch wide between the oblex's main body and the simulacrum. The simulacrum disappears if the tether is severed.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The oblex makes one pseudòpode attack and uses Eat Memories.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Eat Memories
entries: The oblex targets one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15} or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany psíquic and become memory drained until it finishes a short or long rest or until it benefits from the {@spell restabliment superior} or {@spell sanar} spell. Constructs, oozes, plants, and undead succeed on the save automatically.

While memory drained, the target must roll a {@dice d4} and subtract the number rolled from any ability check or attack roll it makes. Each time the target is memory drained beyond the first, the die size increases by one: the {@dice d4} becomes a {@dice d6}, the {@dice d6} becomes a {@dice d8}, and so on until the die becomes a {@dice d20}, at which point the target becomes {@condition inconscient} for 1 hour. The effect then ends.
When an oblex causes a target to become memory drained, the oblex learns all the languages the target knows and gains all its proficiencies, except for any saving throw proficiencies.

monster.name: Air Elemental Myrmidon
idiomes: one language of its creator's choice

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The myrmidon's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The myrmidon makes three flail attacks.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Llança de Llamp {@recharge}
entries: The myrmidon makes one flail attack. Si impacta, the target takes an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany elèctric, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 13} o be {@condition atordit} until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

monster.name: Alkilith
idiomes: understands Abyssal però no pot parlar

trait.name: Amorf
entries: The alkilith pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the alkilith is motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary slime or fungus.

trait.name: Foment Madness
entries: Any creature that isn't a demon that starts its turn within 30 feet of the alkilith ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 18}, or it hears a faint buzzing in its head for a moment and has disadvantage on its next attack roll, saving throw, or ability check.

If the saving throw against Foment Madness fails by 5 or more, the creature is instead subjected to the {@spell confusió} spell for 1 minute (no concentration required by the alkilith). While under the effect of that confusion, the creature is immune to Foment Madness.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The alkilith té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The alkilith makes three tentacle attacks.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) de dany d'àcid.

monster.name: Allip
idiomes: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The allip pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

action.name: Maddening Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Whispers of Madness
entries: The allip chooses up to three creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14}, or it takes 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany psíquic and must use its reaction to make a atac armat cos a cos against one creature of the allip's choice that the allip can see. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

action.name: Howling Babble {@recharge}
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of the allip that can hear it ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 14}. Si falla, a target takes 12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany psíquic, and it is {@condition atordit} fins el final del seu proper torn. Si supera en rep la meitat i no està {@condition atordit}. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The amnizu és Intel·ligència ({@dc 19} salvada de conjur, {@hit 11} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The amnizu pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El amnizu pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The amnizu té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The amnizu uses Poison Mind. It also fa dos atacs: one with its whip and one with its Disruptive Touch.

action.name: Taskmaster Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) de dany de força.

action.name: Disruptive Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}44 ({@damage 8d10}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Poison Mind
entries: The amnizu targets one or two creatures that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 19} or take 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany necròtic i està {@condition encegat} until the start of the amnizu's next turn.

action.name: Forgetfulness {@recharge}
entries: The amnizu targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. That creature ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 18} and on a failure the target is {@condition atordit} durant 1 minut. A {@condition atordit} creature repeats the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target remains {@condition atordit} for the full minute, it forgets everything it sensed, experienced, and learned during the last 5 hours.

reaction.name: Instinctive Charm
entries: When a creature within 60 feet of the amnizu makes an attack roll against it, and another creature is within the attack's range, the attacker ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 19}. Si falla, the attacker must target the creature that is closest to it, not including the amnizu or itself. If multiple creatures are closest, the attacker chooses which one to target. If the saving throw is successful, the attacker is immune to the amnizu's Instinctive Charm for 24 hours.

variant.name: Devil Summoning
entries: Some amnizus have an action that allows them to summon other devils.

entries.name: Summon Devil (1/Dia)
entries: The amnizu summons {@dice 2d4} bearded devils or {@dice 1d4} barbed devils. A summoned devil apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of the amnizu, acts as an ally of the amnizu, and can't summon other devils. It remains for 1 minute, until the amnizu dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The armanite té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The armanite's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The armanite fa tres atacs: one with its hooves, one with its claws, and one with its serrated tail.

action.name: Peülles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Serrated Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Lightning Lance {@recharge 5}
entries: The armanite looses a bolt of lightning in a line 60 feet long and 10 feet wide. Tota criatura a dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Antimagic Cone
entries: The astral dreadnought's opened eye creates an area of antimagic, as in the {@spell camp antimàgic} spell, en un con de 150 peus. A l'inici de cada torn seu, the dreadnought decides which way the cone faces. The cone doesn't function while the dreadnought's eye is closed or while the dreadnought is {@condition encegat}.

trait.name: Astral Entity
entries: The astral dreadnought can't leave the Astral Plane, nor can it be banished or otherwise transported out of the Astral Plane.

trait.name: Demiplanar Donjon
entries: Any creature or object that the astral dreadnought swallows is transported to a demiplane that can be entered by no other means except a {@spell desig} spell or this creature's Donjon Visit ability. A creature can leave the demiplane only by using magic that enables planar travel, such as the {@spell saltar de pla} spell. The demiplane resembles a stone cave roughly 1,000 feet in diameter with a ceiling 100 feet high. Like a stomach, it contains the remains of the dreadnought's past meals.

The dreadnought can't be harmed from within the demiplane. If the dreadnought dies, the demiplane disappears, and everything inside it appears around the corpse. The demiplane is otherwise indestructible.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the astral dreadnought falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de An astral dreadnought's són màgics.

trait.name: Sever Silver Cord
entries: If the astral dreadnought scores a critical hit against a creature traveling through the Astral Plane by means of the {@spell projecció astral} spell, the dreadnought can cut the target's silver cord instead of dealing damage.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The astral dreadnought fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}36 ({@damage 5d10 + 9}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature of Huge size or smaller and this damage reduces it to 0 hit points or it is {@condition incapacitat}, the astral dreadnought swallows it. The swallowed target, along with everything it is wearing and carrying, apareix en un espai desocupat on the floor of the astral dreadnought's Demiplanar Donjon.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) de dany tallant.

legendary.name: Urpa
entries: The astral dreadnought makes one claw attack.

legendary.name: Donjon Visit (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: One creature that is Huge or smaller that the astral dreadnought can see within 60 feet of ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 19} or be magically teleported to an unoccupied space on the floor of the astral dreadnought's Demiplanar Donjon. At the end of the target's next turn, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

legendary.name: Psychic Projection (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the astral dreadnought ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 19}, taking 15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany psíquic; si supera, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The eladrin's és Saviesa ({@dc 16} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Enchanting Presence
entries: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16}. Si falla, the creature is {@condition fascinat} by the eladrin durant 1 minut. Si supera, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Enchanting Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the {@condition fascinat} creature, the creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Pas de Fata {@recharge 4}
entries: Com a acció bonus, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The eladrin té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany tallant mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany psíquic, o 6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany tallant mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany psíquic si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany psíquic.

reaction.name: Foster Peace
entries: If a creature {@condition fascinat} by the eladrin hits with an attack roll while within 60 feet of the eladrin, the eladrin magically causes the attack to miss, provided the eladrin can see the attacker.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de Bael és Carisma ({@dc 21} salvada de conjur, {@hit 13} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):
will: {@spell ego alteració} (can become Medium when changing his appearance)

trait.name: Dreadful
entries: Bael can use a bonus action to appear dreadful fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. Each creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within 10 feet of Bael ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 22} or be {@condition acovardit} until the start of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Bael falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Bael té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Bael's són màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Bael recupera 20 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If he takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Bael dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Bael fa dos atacs armats cos a cos.

action.name: Hellish Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) de dany perforant mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Infernal Command
entries: Each ally of Bael's within 60 feet of him can't be {@condition fascinat} or {@condition acovardit} until the end of his next turn.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: Bael magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Attack (Cost 2 Actions)
entries: Bael attacks once with his hellish morningstar.

legendary.name: Awaken Greed
entries: Bael casts fascinar persona or imatge major.

legendary.name: Infernal Command
entries: Bael uses his Infernal Command action.

legendary.name: Teleportació
entries: Bael uses his Teleport action.

monster.name: Balhannoth
senses: visió a cegues 500 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (2/Dia)
entries: Si the balhannoth falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The balhannoth makes a bite attack and up to two tentacle attacks, or it makes up to four tentacle attacks.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d10 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar) and is moved up to 5 feet toward the balhannoth. Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the balhannoth can't use this tentacle against other targets. The balhannoth has four tentacles.

legendary.name: Bite Attack
entries: The balhannoth makes one bite attack against one creature it has {@condition grappled}.

legendary.name: Teleportació
entries: The balhannoth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying and any creatures it has {@condition grappled}, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Vanish
entries: The balhannoth magically becomes {@condition invisible} for up to 10 minutes or until immediately after it makes an attack roll.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Baphomet's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 18} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Carregar
entries: Si Baphomet es mou 10 peus com a mínim directe cap a un objectiu i l'impacta amb un gore, tot al mateix torn, the target takes an extra 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 25} or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Enteniment Laberíntic
entries: Baphomet can perfectly recall any path he has traveled, and he is immune to the maze spell.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Baphomet falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Baphomet té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Baphomet's són màgics.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: A l'inici del seu torn, Baphomet can gain advantage on all atac armat cos a cos rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against him have advantage fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Baphomet fa tres atacs: one with Heartcleaver, one with his bite, and one with his gore attack.

action.name: Heartcleaver
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d8 + 10}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Empalar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Each creature of Baphomet's choice within 120 feet of him and aware of him ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 18} o estar {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. Una criatura {@condition acovardit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. These later saves have disadvantage if Baphomet is within line of sight of the creature.
If a creature succeeds on any of these saves or the effect ends on it, the creature is immune to Baphomet's Presència Aterradora for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Heartcleaver Attack
entries: Baphomet makes a melee attack with Heartcleaver.

legendary.name: Charge (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Baphomet moves up to his speed, then makes a gore attack.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The berbalang és Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvació de conjur). The berbalang pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Spectral Duplicate (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Com a acció bonus, the berbalang creates one spectral duplicate of itself in an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet of it. While the duplicate exists, the berbalang is {@condition inconscient}. A berbalang can have only one duplicate at a time. The duplicate disappears when it or the berbalang es queda a 0 punts de vida or when the berbalang dismisses it (no requereix acció).

The duplicate has the same statistics and knowledge as the berbalang, and everything experienced by the duplicate is known by the berbalang. All damage dealt by the duplicate's attacks is psychic damage.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The berbalang fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany tallant.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El abishai pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The abishai té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The abishai's són màgics.

trait.name: Sigil de l'Ombra
entries: Quan és dins de llum tènua o de foscor the abishai can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The abishai fa tres atacs: two with its scimitar and one with its bite.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Creeping Darkness {@recharge}
entries: The abishai casts {@spell darkness} at a point within 120 feet of it, sense requerir components. Saviesa is its habilitat de llançament de conjurs for this spell. While the spell persists, the abishai can move the area of darkness up to 60 feet as a bonus action.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The abishai és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 13. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 20} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The abishai has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El abishai pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The abishai té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The abishai's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The abishai fa dos atacs: one with its quarterstaff and one with its bite.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d10 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany elèctric.

monster.name: Boneclaw
idiomes: Common plus the main language of its master

trait.name: Rejovenir
entries: While its master lives, a destroyed boneclaw gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} hours, with all its hit points. The new body appears within 1 mile of the boneclaw's master.

trait.name: Sigil de l'Ombra
entries: Quan és dins de llum tènua o de foscor the boneclaw can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The boneclaw fa dos atacs d'Urpa.

action.name: Piercing Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, the boneclaw can pull the target up to 10 feet toward itself, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar). The boneclaw has two claws. While a claw grapples a target, the claw can attack only that target.

action.name: Shadow Jump
entries: If the boneclaw is in dim light or darkness, each creature of the boneclaw's choice within 5 feet of ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14} or take 34 ({@damage 5d12 + 2}) de dany necròtic.

The boneclaw then magically teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It can bring one creature it's grappling, teleporting that creature to an unoccupied space it can see within 5 feet of its destination. The destination spaces of this teleportation must be in dim light or darkness.

reaction.name: Deadly Reach
entries: In response to a visible enemy moving into its reach, the boneclaw makes one claw attack against that enemy. If the attack hits, the boneclaw can make a second claw attack against the target.

monster.name: Bronze Scout

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

idiomes: understands one language of its creator però no pot parlar

trait.name: Earth Armor
entries: The bronze scout doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it burrows.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The bronze scout té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Lightning Flare (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Each creature in contact with the ground within 15 feet of the bronze scout ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Rotting Presence
entries: When any creature that isn't a demon starts its turn within 30 feet one or more bulezaus, that creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or take {@dice 1d6} de dany necròtic mes 1 necrotic damage for each bulezau within 30 feet of it.

trait.name: Salt Dempeus
entries: The bulezau pot arribar a saltar 20 peus de longitud i 10 peus d'alçada. No li cal agafar embranzida.

trait.name: Cos Estable
entries: The bulezau has advantage on Força and Destresa saving throws made against effects that would knock it {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Cua Espinosa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d12 + 2}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} against disease or become {@condition emmetzinat} until the disease ends. While {@condition emmetzinat} in this way, the target sports festering boils, coughs up flies, and sheds rotting skin, and the target must repeat the saving throw after every 24 hours that elapse. Si supera, the disease ends. Si falla, the target's punts de vida màxims is reduced by 4 ({@dice 1d8}). The target dies if its punts de vida màxims is reduced to 0.

monster.name: Cadaver Collector

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

idiomes: understands all languages però no pot parlar

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The cadaver collector té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Summon Specters (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: Com a acció bonus, the cadaver collector calls up the enslaved spirits of those it has slain; {@dice 1d6} {@creature specter||specters} (without Sensible al Sol) arise in unoccupied spaces within 15 feet of the cadaver collector. The specters act right after the cadaver collector on the same initiative count and fight until they're destroyed. They disappear when the cadaver collector is destroyed.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The cadaver collector makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) de dany contundent mes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Alè de Paralyzing {@recharge 5}
entries: The cadaver collector releases paralyzing gas en un con de 30 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea must make a successful {@dc 18} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. A {@condition paralitzat} creature repeats the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself with a success.

trait.name: Dimensional Lock
entries: Other creatures can't teleport to or from a space within 60 feet of the canoloth. Any attempt to do so is wasted.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The canoloth té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The canoloth's són màgics.

trait.name: Uncanny Senses
entries: The canoloth can't be surprised while it isn't {@condition incapacitat}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The canoloth fa dos atacs: one with its tongue or its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 30 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany perforant. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar), pulled up to 30 feet toward the canoloth, i està {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The canoloth can grapple un objectiu at a time with its tongue.

trait.name: Aberrant Quickness (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The choker can take an extra action on its turn.

trait.name: Boneless
entries: The choker can move through and occupy a space as narrow as 4 inches wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The choker pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The choker makes two tentacle attacks.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}, and the choker can't use this tentacle on another target. The choker has two tentacles. If this attack is a critical hit, the target also can't breathe or speak until the grapple ends.

monster.name: Corpse Flower
senses: visió a cegues 120 peus (sense visió més enllà)

trait.name: Corpses
entries: When first encountered, a corpse flower contains the corpses of {@dice 1d6 + 3} humanoids. A corpse flower can hold the remains of up to nine dead humanoids. These remains have total cover against attacks and other effects outside the corpse flower. If the corpse flower dies, the corpses within it can be pulled free.
While it has at least one humanoid corpse in its body, the corpse flower can use a bonus action to do un/a dels següents:

items: The corpse flower digests one humanoid corpse in its body and instantly regains 11 ({@dice 2d10}) hit points. Nothing of the digested body remains. Any equipment on the corpse is expelled from the corpse flower in its space.

The corpse flower animates one dead humanoid in its body, turning it into a zombie. The zombie apareix en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of the corpse flower and acts immediately after it in the initiative order. The zombie acts as an ally of the corpse flower but isn't under its control, and the flower's stench clings to it (see the Stench of Death trait).

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The corpse flower pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Stench of Death
entries: Each creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the corpse flower or one of its zombies ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14}, unless the creature is a construct or undead. Si falla, the creature is {@condition incapacitat} until the end of the turn. Creatures that are immune to poison damage or the {@condition emmetzinat} condition automatically succeed on this saving throw. Si supera, the creature is immune to the stench of all corpse flowers for 24 hours.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The corpse flower makes three tentacle attacks.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 14} o take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Harvest the Dead
entries: The corpse flower grabs one unsecured dead humanoid within 10 feet of it and stuffs the corpse into itself, along with any equipment the corpse is wearing or carrying. The remains can be used with the Corpses trait.

monster.name: Deathlock

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

idiomes: the languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The deathlock's és Saviesa ({@dc 13} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The deathlock és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Recupera les ranures de conjur quan acaba un Descans Curt o Llarg. Coneix els encanteris de bruixot següents:

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: The deathlock té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Deathly Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany necròtic.

variant.name: Patron-Specific Spells
entries: You can customize a deathlock by replacing some or all of the spells in its Spellcasting trait with spells specific to its patron. Here are examples.

items: Archfey patron: {@spell pampalluga}, {@spell foc follet}, {@spell fam d'Hadar}, {@spell senefes hipnòtiques}, {@spell força fantasmagòrica}, {@spell adormir}
Fiend patron: {@spell ceguera/sordera}, {@spell mans ardents}, {@spell command}, {@spell bola de foc}, {@spell venjança dels inferns}, {@spell raig d'incendi}

Great Old One patron: {@spell armadura d'Àgathys}, {@spell detectar pensaments}, {@spell xiuxiuegos de disbauxa}, {@spell fam d'Hadar}, {@spell Riure Horrible de la Tasha}, {@spell força fantasmagòrica}

monster.name: Deathlock Mastermind
senses: visió de foscor 120 peus (including magical darkness)

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

idiomes: the languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The deathlock's és Saviesa ({@dc 14} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The deathlock és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 10. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Carisma ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Recupera les ranures de conjur quan acaba un Descans Curt o Llarg. Coneix els encanteris de bruixot següents:

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: The deathlock té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Deathly Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) de dany necròtic).

action.name: Vira del Més Enllàs
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, one or two targets. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany necròtic. If the target is Large or smaller, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 16} or become {@condition restrained} as shadowy tendrils wrap around it durant 1 minut. A {@condition restrained} target can use its action to repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

variant.name: Patron-Specific Spells
entries: You can customize a deathlock by replacing some or all of the spells in its Spellcasting trait with spells specific to its patron. Here are examples.

items: Archfey patron: {@spell pampalluga}, {@spell dominar bèstia}, {@spell dominar humanoide}, {@spell foc follet}, {@spell invisibilitat superior}, {@spell fam d'Hadar}, {@spell senefes hipnòtiques}, {@spell força fantasmagòrica}, {@spell aparentar}, {@spell adormir}

Fiend patron: {@spell ceguera/sordera}, {@spell mans ardents}, {@spell command}, {@spell escut de foc}, {@spell bola de foc}, {@spell batussa incendiària}, {@spell venjança dels inferns}, {@spell raig d'incendi}, {@spell núvol fètid}, {@spell paret de foc}

Great Old One patron: {@spell clarividència}, {@spell detectar pensaments}, {@spell xiuxiuegos de disbauxa}, {@spell dominar humanoide}, {@spell Evard's black tentacles}, {@spell fam d'Hadar}, {@spell força fantasmagòrica}, {@spell encàrrec}, {@spell Riure Horrible de la Tasha}, {@spell Telequinesi}

monster.name: Deathlock Wight
idiomes: the languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The wight és Carisma ({@dc 13} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament requiring no verbal or material components

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the wight té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The wight attacks twice with Vira del Més Enllà.

action.name: Vira del Més Enllà
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Drenar Vida
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany necròtic. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or se li redueixen tants punts de vida màxims com dany hagi rebut. Aquesta reducció dura fins que l'objectiu faci un Descans Llarg. L'objectiu mor si aquest efecte li redueix els punts de vida màxim a 0.

A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a {@creature zombie} under the wight's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve {@creature zombie||zombies} under its control at one time.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Demogorgon's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 23} salvació de conjur). Demogorgon pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Demogorgon falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Demogorgon té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Demogorgon's són màgics.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: Demogorgon has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition encegat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition atordit}, or knocked {@condition inconscient}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Demogorgon makes two tentacle attacks.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 3d12 + 9}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 23} or se li redueixen tants punts de vida màxims com dany hagi rebut. Aquesta reducció dura fins que l'objectiu faci un Descans Llarg. The target dies if its punts de vida màxims is reduced to 0.

action.name: Gaze
entries: Demogorgon turns his magical gaze toward one creature that he can see within 120 feet of him. That target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 23}. Unless the target is {@condition incapacitat}, it can avert its eyes to avoid the gaze and to automatically succeed on the save. If the target does so, it can't see Demogorgon fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. If the target looks at him in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If the target fails the save, the target suffers one of the following effects of Demogorgon's choice or at random:
1. Beguiling Gaze. The target is {@condition atordit} until the start of Demogorgon's next turn or until Demogorgon is no longer within line of sight.

2. Hypnotic Gaze. The target is {@condition fascinat} by Demogorgon until the start of Demogorgon's next turn. Demogorgon chooses how the {@condition fascinat} target uses its actions, reactions, and movement. Because this gaze requires Demogorgon to focus both heads on the target, he can't use his Maddening Gaze legendary action fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

3. Insanity Gaze. The target suffers the effect of the {@spell confusió} spell without making a saving throw. The effect lasts until the start of Demogorgon's next turn. Demogorgon doesn't need to concentrate on the spell.

legendary.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) de dany contundent mes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany necròtic.

legendary.name: Maddening Gaze
entries: Demogorgon uses his Gaze action, and must choose either the Beguiling Gaze or the Insanity Gaze effect.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The derro té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the derro té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Hooked Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany perforant. If the target is Medium or smaller, the derro can choose to deal no damage and knock it {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Ballesta Lleugera
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The derro savant és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Th. Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The derro savant té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the derro savant té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The dhergoloth's és Saviesa ({@dc 10} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The dhergoloth té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The dhergoloth's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The dhergoloth fa dos atacs d'Urpa.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Flailing Claws {@recharge 5}
entries: The dhergoloth moves up to its walking speed in a straight line and targets each creature within 5 feet of it during its movement. Each target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14} or take 22 ({@damage 3d12 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: The dhergoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Sentits Aguts
entries: The troll has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte or sight.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The troll recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, it regains only 5 hit points at the start of its next turn. The troll dies only if it is hit by an attack that deals 10 or more acid or fire damage while the troll has 0 hit points.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The troll fa cinc atacs: one with its bite and four with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) de dany perforant mes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Whirlwind of Claws {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 10 feet of the troll ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 19}. Qui falli rep 44 ({@damage 8d10}) de dany tallant; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The drow's és Saviesa ({@dc 16} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The drow és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 16. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Carisma ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Recupera les ranures de conjur quan acaba un Descans Curt o Llarg. Coneix els encanteris de bruixot següents:

trait.name: Canviar de Forma (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The drow can use a bonus action to magically polymorph into a {@creature giant spider}, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. It can speak and cast spells while in giant spider form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying en forma d'humanoide melds into the giant spider form. It can't activate, use, wield, or otherwise benefit from any of its equipment. It reverts to its humanoid form if it dies.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition fascinat}, and the drow no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The drow pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the drow té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The drow ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drow makes two poisonous touch attacks or two bite attacks. The first of these attacks that hits each round deals an extra 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany de verí to the target.

action.name: Poisonous Touch (Només en Forma Humanoide)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 8d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Mossegada (Només en forma de Giant Spider)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat. Si el dany de verí deixa a l'objectiu a 0 punts de vida, l'objectiu s'estabilitza però estarà {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 hora, fins i tot després de recuperar punts de vida, i estarà {@condition paralitzat} mentre pateixi aquest {@condition emmetzinat}.

action.name: Web (Giant Spider Form Only Recharge 5–6)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 30/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} by webbing. Com a acció, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 15} Força check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The drow's és Saviesa ({@dc 18} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The drow és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 11. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition fascinat}, and the drow no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the drow té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

trait.name: War Magic
entries: When the drow uses its action to cast a spell, it can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drow makes three scimitar attacks.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) de dany tallant mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de verí. In addition, the target has disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes against a spell the drow casts before the end of the drow's next turn.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 13} o be {@condition emmetzinat} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition inconscient} while {@condition emmetzinat} in this way. The target regains consciousness if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat

trait.name: Battle Command
entries: Com a acció bonus, the drow targets one ally he can see within 30 feet of him. If the target can see or hear the drow, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the Dodge or Hide action.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition fascinat}, and the drow no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the drow té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drow fa tres atacs: two with his scimitar and one with his whip or his hand crossbow.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany tallant. If the target is an ally, it has advantage on attack rolls fins el final del seu proper torn.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 13} o be {@condition emmetzinat} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition inconscient} while {@condition emmetzinat} in this way. The target regains consciousness if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The drow adds 3 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, the drow must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The drow's és Saviesa ({@dc 18} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs

spells: {@spell dissipar el bé i el mal}

trait.name: Discern Lie
entries: The drow knows when she hears a creature speak a lie in a language she knows.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drow makes three death lance attacks.

action.name: Death Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany necròtic. The target's punts de vida màxims is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage it takes. Aquesta reducció dura fins que l'objectiu faci un Descans Llarg. The target dies if its punts de vida màxims is reduced to 0.

variant.name: Demon Summoning
entries: Some drow inquisitors have an action that allows them to summon a demon.

entries.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The drow attempts to magically summon a yochlol, with a {@chance 50|50 percent} chance of success. If the attempt fails, the drow takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany psíquic. Otherwise, the summoned demon apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action. (see notes for link)

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The drow's és Saviesa ({@dc 20} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The drow és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 20. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Saviesa ({@dc 19} salvada de conjur, {@hit 11} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The drow has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition fascinat}, and the drow no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

trait.name: Lolth's Fickle Favor
entries: Com a acció bonus, the matron can bestow the Spider Queen's blessing on one ally she can see within 30 feet of her. The ally takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany psíquic but has advantage on the next attack roll it makes fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The drow té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the drow té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The matron mother makes two demon staff attacks or three tentacle rod attacks.

action.name: Demon Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany contundent, o 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans, plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany psíquic. In addition, the target must succeed on a DC19 Saviesa saving throw or become {@condition acovardit} of the drow durant 1 minut. L'objectiu {@condition acovardit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Tentacle Rod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent. If the target is hit three times by the rod on one turn, the target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 15} or suffer the following effects for 1 minute: the target's speed is halved, it has disadvantage on Destresa saving throws, and it can't use reactions. Moreover, on each of its turns, it can take either an action or a bonus action, but not both. Al final de cada torn seu, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Summon Servant (1/Dia)
entries: The drow magically summons a {@creature retriever|mtf} or a {@creature yochlol}. The summoned creature apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

legendary.name: Demon Staff
entries: The drow makes one attack with her demon staff.

legendary.name: Compel Demon (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: An allied demon within 30 feet of the drow uses its reaction to make one attack against a target of the drow's choice that she can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 1–3 Actions)
entries: The drow expends a spell slot to cast a 1st-, 2nd-, o 3rd-level spell that she has prepared. Doing so costs 1 legendary action per level of the spell.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition fascinat}, and the drow no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

trait.name: Shadow Step
entries: Quan és dins de llum tènua o de foscor the drow can teleport as a bonus action up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light or darkness. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the drow té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The drow fa dos atacs with its shadow sword. If either attack hits and the target is within 10 feet of a 5-foot cube of darkness created by the shadow sword on a previous turn, the drow can dismiss that darkness and cause the target to take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany necròtic. The drow can dismiss darkness in this way no more than un cop per torn.

action.name: Shadow Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany necròtic and 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí. The drow can then fill an unoccupied 5-foot cube within 5 feet of the target with magical darkness, which remains durant 1 minut.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 13} o be {@condition emmetzinat} for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition inconscient} while {@condition emmetzinat} in this way. The target regains consciousness if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it.

variant.name: Shadow Demon Summoning
entries: Some drow shadowblades have an action that allows them to summon a demon.

entries.name: Summon Shadow Demon (1/Dia)
entries: The drow attempts to magically summon a shadow demon with a {@chance 50|50 percent} chance of success. If the attempt fails, the drow takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany psíquic. Otherwise, the summoned demon apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 10 minutes, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The duergar té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Psychic Engine
entries: When the duergar despot suffers a critical hit or is reduced to 0 hit points, psychic energy erupts from its frame to deal 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany psíquic to each creature within 5 feet of it.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the duergar despot té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The despot makes two iron fist attacks and two stomping foot attacks. It can replace up to four of these attacks with uses of its Flame Jet.

action.name: Iron Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must make a successful {@dc 17} Força saving throw or be thrown up to 30 feet away in a straight line. The target is knocked {@condition enderrocat} and then takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Peu Esclafador
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany contundent, o 18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) de dany contundent to a {@condition enderrocat} target.

action.name: Flame Jet
entries: The duergar spews flames in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Tota criatura a dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

Si impacta, the attack deals an extra 5 ({@dice 1d10}) damage to the hammerer, and the hammerer can respond by using its Multiattack with its reaction.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The hammerer fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac

action.name: Urpa

action.name: Hammer

trait.name: Entrenament Cavalry
entries: When the duergar hits a target with a melee attack while mounted on a female steeder, the steeder can make one melee attack against the same target as a reaction.

entries: The màgia duergarally turns {@condition invisible} for up to 1 hour or until it attacks, it casts a spell, or its concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it. While the {@condition invisible} duergar is mounted on a female steeder, the steeder is {@condition invisible} as well. The invisibility ends early on the steeder immediately after it attacks.

trait.name: Resiliència Duergar

action.name: Invisibility {@recharge 4}

action.name: Mind Mastery
entries: The duergar targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 12}, or the duergar causes it to use its reaction either to make one weapon attack against another creature the duergar can see or to move up to 10 feet in a direction of the duergar's choice. Creatures that can't be {@condition fascinat} are immune to this effect.

action.name: Reduce (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, the màgia duergarally decreases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While reduced, the duergar is Tiny, reduces its weapon damage to 1, and makes attacks, checks, and saving throws with disadvantage if they use Força. It gains a +5 bonus to all Destresa ({@skill Sigil}) checks and a +5 bonus to its AC. It can also take a bonus action on each of its turns to take the Hide action.

action.name: Multi-atac

action.name: Drill
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) de dany perforant.

If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

action.name: Invisibility {@recharge 4}
entries: The màgia duergarally turns {@condition invisible} for up to 1 hour or until it attacks, it casts a spell, it uses its Enlarge, or its concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

reaction.name: Scouring Instruction
entries: When an ally that the duergar can see makes a {@dice d20} roll, the duergar can roll a {@dice 1d6} and the ally can add the number rolled to the {@dice d20} roll by taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany psíquic. A creature immune to psychic damage can't be affected by Scouring Instruction.

trait.name: Resiliència Duergar
entries: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being {@condition fascinat} or {@condition paralitzat}.

trait.name: Sensible al Sol
entries: the duergar té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar, as well as a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin la vista.

action.name: Fire Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar (with disadvantage if the target is within 5 feet of the duergar), 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc, o 16 ({@damage 2d12 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de foc while enlarged.

action.name: Fire Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: From its fire lance, the duergar shoots a 15-foot cone of fire or a line of fire 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 12}. Qui falli rep 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Enlarge (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: For 1 minute, the màgia duergarally increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Força-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Força checks and Força saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

action.name: Invisibility (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The màgia duergarally turns {@condition invisible} for up to 1 hour or until it attacks, it casts a spell, it uses its Enlarge, or its concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The dybbuk's és Saviesa ({@dc 12} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The dybbuk pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The dybbuk té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Violate Corpse
entries: The dybbuk can use a bonus action while it is possessing a corpse to make it do something unnatural, such as vomit blood, twist its head all the way around, or cause a quadruped to move as a biped. Any beast or humanoid that sees this behavior ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 12} o estar {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. La criatura {@condition acovardit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. A creature that succeeds on a saving throw against this ability is immune to Violate Corpse for 24 hours.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany necròtic. If the target is a creature, its punts de vida màxims is also reduced by 3 ({@dice 1d6}). This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. L'objectiu mor si aquest efecte li redueix els punts de vida màxim a 0.

action.name: Possess Corpse {@recharge}
entries: The dybbuk disappears into an intact corpse it can see within 5 feet of it. The corpse must be Large or smaller and be that of a beast or a humanoid. The dybbuk is now effectively the possessed creature. Its type becomes undead, though it now looks alive, and it gains a number of temporary hit points equal to the corpse's punts de vida màxims in life.

While possessing the corpse, the dybbuk retains its hit points, alignment, Intel·ligència, Saviesa, Carisma, telepathy, and immunity to poison damage, {@condition exhaust}, and being {@condition fascinat} and {@condition acovardit}. It otherwise uses the possessed target's game statistics, gaining access to its knowledge and proficiencies but not its class features, if any.

The possession lasts until the temporary hit points are lost (at which point the body becomes a corpse once more) or the dybbuk ends its possession using a bonus action. When the possession ends, the dybbuk reapareix en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of the corpse.

monster.name: Earth Elemental Myrmidon
idiomes: one language of its creator's choice

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The myrmidon's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The myrmidon makes two maul attacks.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Thunderous Strike {@recharge}
entries: The myrmidon makes one maul attack. Si impacta, the target takes an extra 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany de tro, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Força amb {@dc 14} o be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

monster.name: Eidolon
idiomes: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The eidolon pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el torn dins d'un objecte other than a sacred statue.

trait.name: Sacred Animation {@recharge 5}
entries: When the eidolon moves into a space occupied by a sacred statue, the eidolon can disappear, causing the statue to become a creature under the eidolon's control. The eidolon uses the {@creature sacred statue|mtf}'s statistics in place of its own.

trait.name: Resistir l'Expulsió
entries: The eidolon té avantatge a salvar contra efectes que expulsin no-morts.

action.name: Divine Dread
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the eidolon that can see ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15} or be {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. While {@condition acovardit} in this way, the creature must take the Dash action and move away from the eidolon by the safest available route a l'inici de cada torn seu, unless there is nowhere for it to move, in which case the creature also becomes {@condition atordit} until it can move again. Un objectiu {@condition acovardit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to any eidolon's Divine Dread for the next 24 hours.

monster.name: Elder Oblex
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (blind beyond this distance)

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The oblex és Intel·ligència ({@dc 18} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amorf
entries: The oblex pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

trait.name: Aversion to Fire
entries: Si the oblex rep dany de foc té desavantatge a tirades d'impactar i d'habilitat fins el final del seu proper torn.

trait.name: Sulfurous Impersonation
entries: Com a acció bonus, the oblex can extrude a piece of itself that assumes the appearance of one Medium or smaller creature whose memories it has stolen. This simulacrum appears, feels, and sounds exactly like the creature it impersonates, though it smells faintly of sulfur. The oblex can impersonate {@dice 2d6 + 1} different creatures, each one tethered to its body by a strand of slime that can extend up to 120 feet away. For all practical purposes, the simulacrum is the oblex, meaning the oblex occupies its space and the simulacrum's space simultaneously. The slimy tether is immune to damage, but it is severed if there is no opening at least 1 inch wide between the oblex's main body and the simulacrum. The simulacrum disappears if the tether is severed.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The elder oblex makes two pseudòpode attacks and uses Eat Memories.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Eat Memories
entries: The oblex targets one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 18} or take 44 ({@damage 8d10}) de dany psíquic and become memory drained until it finishes a short or long rest or until it benefits from the {@spell restabliment superior} or {@spell sanar} spell. Constructs, oozes, plants, and undead succeed on the save automatically.

While memory drained, the target must roll a {@dice d4} and subtract the number rolled from any ability check or attack roll it makes. Each time the target is memory drained beyond the first, the die size increases by one: the {@dice d4} becomes a {@dice d6}, the {@dice d6} becomes a {@dice d8}, and so on until the die becomes a {@dice d20}, at which point the target becomes {@condition inconscient} for 1 hour. The effect then ends.
When an oblex causes a target to become memory drained, the oblex learns all the languages the target knows and gains all its proficiencies, except any saving throw proficiencies.

trait.name: Air Form
entries: The tempest can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The tempest no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the tempest falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Living Storm
entries: The tempest is always at the center of a storm {@dice 1d6 + 4} miles in diameter. Heavy precipitation in the form of either rain or snow falls there, causing the area to be lightly obscured. Heavy rain also extinguishes open flames and imposes disadvantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'oïda.
In addition, strong winds swirl in the area covered by the storm. The winds impose disadvantage on ranged attack rolls. The winds extinguish open flames and disperse fog.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The tempest fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The tempest fa dos atacs with its thunderous slam.

action.name: Thunderous Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d6 + 9}) de dany de tro.

action.name: Lightning Storm {@recharge}
entries: All other creatures within 120 feet of the tempest must each make a {@dc 20} Destresa saving throw. Qui falli rep 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat. If a target's saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is also {@condition atordit} fins el final del seu proper torn.

legendary.name: Moure
entries: The tempest moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Llança de Llamp (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The tempest can cause a bolt of lightning to strike a point on the ground anywhere under its storm. Each creature within 5 feet of that point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20}. Qui falli rep 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Screaming Gale (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The tempest releases a blast of thunder and wind in a line that is 1 mile long and 20 feet wide. Objects in that area take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de tro. Each creature there ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 21} or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de tro and be flung up to 60 feet in a direction away from the line. If a thrown target collides with an objecte inamovible, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent for every 10 feet it was thrown before impact. If the target would collide with another creature instead, that other creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 19} or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The steeder pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Extraordinary Leap
entries: The distance of the steeder's long jumps is tripled; every foot of its walking speed that it spends on the jump allows it to move 3 feet.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Sticky Leg
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}The target is stuck to the steeder's leg i està {@condition grappled} until it escapes ({@dc 12} per escapar). The steeder can have only one creature {@condition grappled} at a time.

monster.name: Fire Elemental Myrmidon
idiomes: one language of its creator's choice

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The myrmidon sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in a 40-foot radius.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The myrmidon's són màgics.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the myrmidon moves in 1 foot or more of water, it takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The myrmidon makes three scimitar attacks.

action.name: Simitarra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Fiery Strikes {@recharge}
entries: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
