headerEntries: Fraz-Urb'luu's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 23} salvació de conjur). Fraz-Urb'luu pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):
will: {@spell ego alteració} (can become Medium when changing his appearance)

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: If Fraz-Urb'luu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Fraz-Urb'luu té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Fraz-Urb'luu's són màgics.

trait.name: Undetectable
entries: Fraz-Urb'luu can't be targeted by divination magic, perceived through magical scrying sensors, or detected by abilities that sense demons or fiends.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Fraz-Urb'luu fa tres atacs: one with his bite and two with his fists.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) de dany contundent.

legendary.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) de dany contundent. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} ({@dc 24} per escapar). The {@condition grappled} target is also {@condition restrained}. Fraz-Urb'luu can grapple only one creature with his tail at a time.

legendary.name: Assassí Fantasmagòric (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Fraz-Urb'luu casts {@spell assassí fantasmagòric}, no concentration required.

trait.name: Burning Fury
entries: When the salamander takes fire damage, its Freezing Breath automatically recharges.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The salamander fa cinc atacs: four with its claws and one with its bite.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany perforant and 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de fred.

action.name: Freezing Breath {@recharge}
entries: The salamander exhales chill wind en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17}. Qui falli rep 44 ({@damage 8d10}) de dany de fred; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de Geryon's és Saviesa ({@dc 21} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):
will: {@spell ego alteració} (can become Medium when changing his appearance)

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Geryon falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Geryon té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Geryon's són màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Geryon recupera 20 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Geryon dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Geryon fa dos atacs: one with his claws and one with his stinger.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d6 + 9}) de dany tallant. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 24}) i està {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. Geryon can grapple one creature at a time. If the target is already {@condition grappled} by Geryon, the target takes an extra 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Fibló
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d4 + 9}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 21} o take 13 ({@damage 2d12}) de dany de verí and become {@condition emmetzinat} until it finishes a short or long rest. The target's punts de vida màxims is reduced by an amount equal to half the poison damage it takes. If its punts de vida màxims drops to 0, it dies. This reduction lasts until the {@condition emmetzinat} condition is removed.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: Geryon magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Infernal Glare
entries: Geryon targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. If the target can see Geryon, the target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 23} or become {@condition acovardit} of Geryon fins el final del seu proper torn.

legendary.name: Swift Sting (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Geryon attacks with his stinger.

legendary.name: Teleportació
entries: Geryon uses his Teleport action.

variant.name: Sound the Horn
entries: Geryon can have an action that allows him to summon enslaved minotaures.

entries.name: Sound the Horn (1/Dia)
entries: Geryon blows his horn, which causes {@dice 5d4} minotaures to appear in unoccupied spaces of his choice within 600 feet of him. The minotaures roll initiative when they appear. They remain until they die or Geryon uses an action to dismiss any or all of them.

trait.name: Headfirst Charge
entries: The giff can try to knock a creature over; if the giff moves at least 20 feet in a straight line that ends within 5 feet of a Large or smaller creature, that creature ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 14} or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany contundent and be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

trait.name: Firearms Knowledge
entries: The giff's mastery of its weapons enables it to ignore the loading property of muskets and pistols.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giff makes two pistol attacks.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Musket
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 40/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d12 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/90 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Fragmentation Grenade (1/Dia)
entries: The giff throws a grenade up to 60 feet. Each creature within 20 feet of the grenade's detonation ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany perforant; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The githyanki és Intel·ligència ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components
will: {@spell mà de mag} (the hand is invisible)

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The githyanki is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The githyanki has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: War Magic
entries: When the githyanki uses its action to cast a spell, it can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The githyanki makes two longsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany psíquic, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany psíquic si s'usa amb dues mans.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The githyanki és Intel·ligència ({@dc 15} salvada de conjur, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components
will: {@spell mà de mag} (the hand is invisible)

trait.name: Rally the Troops
entries: Com a acció bonus, the githyanki can magically end the {@condition fascinat} and {@condition acovardit} conditions on itself and each creature of its choice that it can see within 30 feet of it.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The githyanki makes three greatsword attacks.

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany psíquic.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The githyanki adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the githyanki must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The githyanki és Intel·ligència ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components
will: {@spell mà de mag} (the hand is invisible)

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The githyanki makes two greatsword attacks.

action.name: Silver Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) de dany tallant mes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany psíquic. On a critical hit against a target in an astral body (as with the {@spell projecció astral} spell), the githyanki can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The githyanki adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the githyanki must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

legendary.name: Attack (2 Actions)
entries: The githyanki makes a greatsword attack.

legendary.name: Command Ally
entries: The githyanki targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the githyanki, the target can make one atac armat cos a cos using its reaction and has advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Teleportació
entries: The githyanki magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing and carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it. It also becomes insubstantial fins a l'inici del seu següent torn. While insubstantial, it pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Si acaba el torn dins d'un objecte, it takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany de força and is moved to the nearest unoccupied space.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The anarch és Saviesa ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components
will: {@spell mà de mag} (the hand is invisible)

trait.name: Psychic Defense
entries: While the anarch is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Saviesa modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The anarch makes three atacs desarmats.

action.name: Atac Desarmat
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany contundent mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany psíquic.

legendary.name: Strike
entries: The anarch makes one atac desarmat.

legendary.name: Teleportació
entries: The anarch magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing and carrying, to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it.

legendary.name: Change Gravity (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: The anarch casts the {@spell invertir la gravetat} spell. The spell has the normal effect, except that the anarch can orient the area in any direction and creatures and objects fall toward the end of the area.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat (Psiònics)
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The githzerai és Saviesa ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components
will: {@spell mà de mag} (the hand is invisible)

trait.name: Psychic Defense
entries: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Saviesa modifier.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The githzerai makes three atacs desarmats.

action.name: Atac Desarmat
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Temporal Strike {@recharge}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent mes 52 ({@damage 8d12}) de dany psíquic. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} or move 1 round forward in time. A target moved forward in time vanishes for the duration. When the effect ends, the target reappears in the space it left or in an unoccupied space nearest to that space if it's occupied.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The gloom weaver és Carisma ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The gloom weaver és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 12. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Carisma ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Recupera les ranures de conjur quan acaba un Descans Curt o Llarg. Coneix els encanteris de bruixot següents:
footerEntries: *3 beams +4 bonus to each damage roll

trait.name: Burden of Time
entries: Beasts and humanoids, other than shadar-kai, have disadvantage on saving throws while within 10 feet of the gloom weaver.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The gloom weaver té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition fascinat} i no pot patir son màgicament

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gloom weaver makes two spear attacks and casts one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Shadow Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany necròtic, o 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany necròtic si s'usa amb dues mans.

reaction.name: Misty Escape (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: When the gloom weaver takes damage, it turns {@condition invisible} and teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains {@condition invisible} fins a l'inici del seu següent torn or until it attacks or casts a spell.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The gray render fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) de dany perforant. If the target is Medium or smaller, the target ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 16} or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant. If the target is {@condition enderrocat} an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany contundent is dealt to the target.

reaction.name: Bloody Rampage
entries: When the gray render takes damage, it makes one attack with its claws against a random creature within its reach, other than its master.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Graz'zt's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 23} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Canviaformes
entries: Graz'zt can use his action to polymorph into a form that resembles a Medium humanoid, or back into his true form. Aside from his size, his statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: If Graz'zt fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Graz'zt té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Graz'zt's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Graz'zt attacks twice with Wave of Sorrow.

action.name: Wave of Sorrow (Greatsword)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) de dany tallant mes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: Graz'zt magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Graz'zt attacks once with Wave of Sorrow.

legendary.name: Dance, My Puppet
entries: One creature {@condition fascinat} by Graz'zt that Graz'zt can see must use its reaction to move up to its speed as Graz'zt directs.

legendary.name: Sow Discord
entries: Graz'zt casts corona de bogeria or xiuxiuegos de disbauxa.

legendary.name: Teleportació
entries: Graz'zt uses his Teleport action.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The abishai's és Saviesa ({@dc 17} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El abishai pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The abishai té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The abishai's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The abishai fa dos atacs, one with its claws and one with its longsword, or it casts one spell from its Innate Spellcasting trait and makes one claw attack.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany tallant, o 6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de verí and become {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu {@condition emmetzinat} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

monster.name: Hellfire Engine

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

idiomes: understands Infernal però no pot parlar

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The hellfire engine és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The hellfire engine té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Flesh-Crushing Stride
entries: The hellfire engine moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the hellfire engine enters ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18}. Si supera, the creature is pushed to the nearest space out of the hellfire engine's path. Si falla, the creature falls {@condition enderrocat} and takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) de dany contundent.

If the hellfire engine remains in the {@condition enderrocat} creature's space, the creature is also {@condition restrained} until it's no longer in the same space as the hellfire engine. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can make a {@dc 18} Força check. On a success, the creature is shunted to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the hellfire engine and is no longer {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Hellfire Weapons
entries: The hellfire engine uses one of the following options:

items.name: Bonemelt Sprayer
items.entry: The hellfire engine spews acidic flame en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura a dins del con ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20}. Qui falli rep 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de foc mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat. Creatures that fail the saving throw are drenched in burning acid and take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany d'àcid at the end of their turns. An affected creature or another creature within 5 feet of it can take an action to scrape off the burning fuel.

items.name: Lightning Flail
items.entry: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) de dany contundent mes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany elèctric. Up to three other creatures of the hellfire engine's choice that it can see within 30 feet of the target must each make a {@dc 20} Destresa saving throw. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Thunder Canó
items.entry: The hellfire engine targets a point within 120 feet of it that it can see. Each creature within 30 feet of that point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20}. Qui falli rep 27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany contundent mes 13 ({@damage 2d12}) de dany de tro; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

entries: If the chosen option kills a creature, the creature's soul rises from the River Styx as a lemure in Avernus in {@dice 1d4} hours. If the creature isn't revived before then, only a {@spell desig} spell or killing the lemure and casting resurrecció veritable on the creature's original body can restore it to life. Constructs and devils are immune to this effect.

monster.name: Howler
idiomes: understands Abyssal però no pot parlar

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: A howler has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the howler's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitat}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The howler makes two bite attacks.

action.name: Rending Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is {@condition acovardit} it takes an additional 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany psíquic. This attack ignores damage resistance.

action.name: Mind-Breaking Howl {@recharge}
entries: The howler emits a keening howl en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea that isn't {@condition eixordat} ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} or be {@condition acovardit} until the end of the howler's next turn. While a creature is {@condition acovardit} in this way, its speed is halved, and it is {@condition incapacitat}. A target that successfully saves is immune to the Mind-Breaking Howl of all howlers for the next 24 hours.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de Hutijin's és Saviesa ({@dc 22} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):
will: {@spell ego alteració} (can become Medium when changing his appearance)

trait.name: Infernal Despair
entries: Each creature within 15 feet of Hutijin that isn't a devil makes saving throws with disadvantage.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Hutijin falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Hutijin té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Hutijin's són màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Hutijin recupera 20 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Hutijin dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Hutijin fa quatre atacs: one with his bite, one with his claw, one with his mace, and one with his tail.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) de dany perforant. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 22} or become {@condition emmetzinat}. While {@condition emmetzinat} in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí a l'inici de cada torn seu. L'objectiu {@condition emmetzinat} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Maça
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: Hutijin magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

reaction.name: Fearful Voice {@recharge 5}
entries: In response to taking damage, Hutijin utters a dreadful word of power. Each creature within 30 feet of him that isn't a devil ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 22} or become {@condition acovardit} of him durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. A creature that saves against this effect is immune to Hutijin's Fearful Voice for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Hutijin attacks once with his mace.

legendary.name: Lightning Storm (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Hutijin releases lightning in a 20-foot radius. All other creatures in that area must each make a {@dc 22} Destresa saving throw. Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Teleportació
entries: Hutijin uses his Teleport action.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The hydroloth és Intel·ligència ({@dc 16} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The hydroloth pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The hydroloth té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The hydroloth's són màgics.

trait.name: Secure Memory
entries: The hydroloth is immune to the waters of the River Styx as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.

trait.name: Watery Advantage
entries: While submerged in liquid, the hydroloth has advantage on attack rolls.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hydroloth fa dos atacs cos a cos. In place of one of these attacks, it can cast one spell that takes 1 action to cast.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Steal Memory (1/Dia)
entries: The hydroloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target takes {@dice 4d6} de dany psíquic, and it ha de salvar per Intel·ligència amb {@dc 16}. Si supera, the target becomes immune to this hydroloth's Steal Memory for 24 hours. Si falla, the target loses all proficiencies, it can't cast spells, it can't understand language, and if its Intel·ligència and Carisma scores are higher than 5, they become 5. Each time the target finishes a long rest, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A {@spell restabliment superior} or {@spell anul·lar maledicció} spell cast on the target ends this effect early.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: The hydroloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

monster.name: Iron Cobra

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

idiomes: understands one language of its creator però no pot parlar

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The iron cobra té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} or suffer one random poison effect:
1. Poison Damage: The target takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany de verí.

2. Confusion: On its next turn, the target must use its action to make one weapon attack against a random creature it can see within 30 feet of it, using whatever weapon it has in hand and moving beforehand if necessary to get in range. If it's holding no weapon, it makes an atac desarmat. If no creature is visible within 30 feet, it takes the Dash action, moving toward the nearest creature.
3. Paralysis: The target is {@condition paralitzat} fins el final del seu proper torn.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Juiblex's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Juiblex pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Foul
entries: Any creature, other than an ooze, that starts its turn within 10 feet of Juiblex ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21} or be {@condition emmetzinat} until the start of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Juiblex falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Juiblex té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Juiblex's són màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Juiblex recupera 20 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If it takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn. Juiblex dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: Juiblex pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Juiblex makes three acid lash attacks.

action.name: Acid Lash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) de dany d'àcid. Any creature killed by this attack is drawn into Juiblex's body, and the corpse is obliterated after 1 minute.

action.name: Eject Slime {@recharge 5}
entries: Juiblex spews out a corrosive slime, targeting one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 21}. On a failure, the target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) de dany d'àcid. Unless the target avoids taking any of this damage, any metal armor worn by the target takes a permanent −1 penalty to the AC it offers, and any metal weapon it is carrying or wearing takes a permanent −1 penalty to damage rolls. The penalty worsens each time a target is subjected to this effect. If the penalty on an object drops to −5, the object is destroyed.

legendary.name: Esquitx Àcid
entries: Juiblex casts esquitx àcid.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Juiblex makes one acid lash attack.

legendary.name: Corrupting Touch (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) de dany de verí, and the target is slimed. Until the slime is scraped off with an action, the target is {@condition emmetzinat}, and any creature, other than an ooze, is {@condition emmetzinat} while within 10 feet of the target.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The kruthik has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The kruthik té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de kruthik's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

trait.name: Tuneladora
entries: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The kruthik makes two stab attacks or two spike attacks.

action.name: Stab
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Spike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The kruthik sprays acid en un con de 15 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany d'àcid; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the leviathan falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Partial Freeze
entries: If the leviathan takes 50 cold damage or more during a single turn, the leviathan partially freezes; fins el final del seu proper torn. its speeds are reduced to 20 feet, and it makes attack rolls with disadvantage.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The leviathan deals double damage to objects and structures (included in Tidal Wave).

trait.name: Water Form
entries: The leviathan can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The leviathan fa dos atacs: one with its slam and one with its tail.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 1d10 + 10}) de dany contundent mes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 1d12 + 10}) de dany contundent mes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Tidal Wave {@recharge}
entries: While submerged, the leviathan magically creates a Paret d'Aigua centered on itself. The wall is up 250 feet long, up to 250 feet high, and up to 50 feet thick. When the wall appears, all other creatures within its area must each make a {@dc 24} Força saving throw. A creature takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) de dany contundent on failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.

A l'inici de cada torn de the leviathan after the wall appears, the wall, along with any other creatures in it, moves 50 feet away from the leviathan. Any Huge or smaller creature inside the wall or whose space the wall enters when it moves ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 24} or take 27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany contundent. A creature takes this damage no more than once on a turn. At the end of each turn the wall moves, the wall's height is reduced by 50 feet, and the damage creatures take from the wall on subsequent rounds is reduced by {@dice 1d10}. When the wall reaches 0 feet in height, the effect ends.
A creature caught in the wall can move by swimming. Because of the force of the wave, though, the creature must make a successful {@dc 24} Força (Atletisme) check to swim at all during that turn.

legendary.name: Slam (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The leviathan makes one slam attack.

legendary.name: Moure
entries: The leviathan moves up to its speed.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The steeder pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

trait.name: Extraordinary Leap
entries: The distance of the steeder's long jumps is tripled; every foot of its walking speed that it spends on the jump allows it to jump 3 feet.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Sticky Leg
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, one Small or Tiny creature. {@h}The target is stuck to the steeder's leg i està {@condition grappled} until it escapes ({@dc 12} per escapar). The steeder can have only one creature {@condition grappled} at a time.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The marut és Intel·ligència ({@dc 20} salvació de conjur). The marut pot llançar aquest conjur innatament, sense que calguin components materials.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: The marut és immune a tot conjur o efecte que vulgui alterar-li la forma.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the marut falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The marut té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The marut makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Unerring Slam
entries: {@atk mw} automatic hit, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}60 force damage, and the target is pushed up to 5 feet away from the marut if it is Huge or smaller.

action.name: Blazing Edict {@recharge 5}
entries: Arcane energy emanates from the marut's chest in a 60-foot cube. Every creature in that area takes 45 radiant damage. Each creature that takes any of this damage ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 20} or be {@condition atordit} until the end of the marut's next turn.

action.name: Justify
entries: The marut targets up to two creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 20} or be teleported to a cercle de teletransport in the Hall of Concordance in Sigil. A target fails automatically if it is {@condition incapacitat}. If either target is teleported in this way, the marut teleports with it to the circle.
After teleporting in this way, the marut can't use this action again until it finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Assume Form
entries: The maurezhi can assume the appearance of any Medium humanoid it has eaten. It remains in this form for {@dice 1d6} days, during which time the form gradually decays until, when the effect ends, the form sloughs from the demon's body.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The maurezhi té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The maurezhi fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) de dany perforant. If the target is a humanoid, its Carisma score is reduced by {@dice 1d4}. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. The target dies if this reduces its Carisma to 0. It rises 24 hours later as a ghoul, unless it has been revived or its corpse has been destroyed.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany tallant. If the target is a creature other than an undead, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Raise Ghoul {@recharge 5}
entries: The maurezhi targets one dead ghoul or ghast it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is revived with all its hit points.

trait.name: Sigil de l'Ombra
entries: Quan és dins de llum tènua o de foscor the meazel can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Garrote
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu of the meazel's size or smaller. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13} with disadvantage). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent at the start of each of the meazel's turns. The meazel can't make weapon attacks while grappling a creature in this way.

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Shadow Teleport {@recharge 5}
entries: The meazel, any equipment it is wearing or carrying, and any creature it is grappling teleport to an unoccupied space within 500 feet of it, provided that the starting space and the destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination must be a place the meazel has seen before, but it need not be within line of sight. If the destination space is occupied, the teleportation leads to the nearest unoccupied space.

Any other creature the meazel teleports becomes cursed by shadow for 1 hour. Until this curse ends, every undead and every creature native to the Erm de l'Ombra within 300 feet of the cursed creature can sense it, which prevents that creature from hiding from them.

monster.name: Merregon

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

idiomes: understands Infernal però no pot parlar

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El merregon pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The merregon té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The merregon makes two halberd attacks, or if an allied fiend amb un valor de repte de 6 o superior is within 60 feet of it, the merregon makes three halberd attacks.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Loyal Bodyguard
entries: When another fiend within 5 feet of the merregon is hit by an attack, the merregon causes itself to be hit instead.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The merrenoloth és Intel·ligència ({@dc 13} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The merrenoloth té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The merrenoloth's són màgics.

trait.name: Teleportació
entries: Com a acció bonus, the merrenoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The merrenoloth uses Fear Gaze once and makes one oar attack.

action.name: Oar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Fear Gaze
entries: The merrenoloth targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13} o estar {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu {@condition acovardit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de Moloch's és Saviesa ({@dc 21} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):
will: {@spell ego alteració} (can become Medium when changing his appearance)

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Moloch falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Moloch té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Moloch's són màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Moloch recupera 20 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Moloch dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Moloch fa tres atacs: one with his bite, one with his claw, and one with his whip.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d8 + 8}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Many-Tailed Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 30 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d4 + 8}) de dany tallant mes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany elèctric. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 24} or be pulled up to 30 feet in a straight line toward Moloch.

action.name: Breath of Despair {@recharge 5}
entries: Moloch exhales in a 30-foot cube. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 21} or take 27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany psíquic, drop whatever it is holding, and become {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. While {@condition acovardit} in this way, a creature must take the Dash action and move away from Moloch by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the Dash action. If the creature ends its turn in a location where it doesn't have line of sight to Moloch, the creature can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: Moloch magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Núvol Fètid
entries: Moloch casts núvol fètid.

legendary.name: Teleportació
entries: Moloch uses his Teleport action.

legendary.name: Whip
entries: Moloch makes one attack with his whip.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The molydeus's és Saviesa ({@dc 22} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the molydeus falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The molydeus té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The molydeus's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The molydeus fa tres atacs: one with its weapon, one with its wolf bite, and one with its snakebite.

action.name: Demonic Weapon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) de dany tallant. If the target has at least one head and the molydeus rolled a 20 on the attack roll, the target is decapitated and dies if it can't survive without that head. A target is immune to this effect if it takes none of the damage, has legendary actions, or is Huge or larger. Such a creature takes an extra {@dice 6d8} de dany tallant from the hit.

action.name: Wolf Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Snakebite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d6 + 9}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 22} o se li redueixen tants punts de vida màxims com dany hagi rebut. Aquesta reducció dura fins que l'objectiu faci un Descans Llarg. The target transforms into a {@creature manes} if this reduces its punts de vida màxims to 0. This transformation can be ended only by a {@spell desig} spell.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The molydeus makes one attack, either with its demonic weapon or with its snakebite.

legendary.name: Moure
entries: The molydeus moves sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell
entries: The molydeus casts one spell from its Innate Spellcasting trait.

variant.name: Demon Summoning
entries: You can give a molydeus the ability to summon other demons.

entries.name: Summon Demon (1/Dia)
entries: Com a acció, the molydeus has a {@chance 50|50 percent} chance of summoning its choice of {@dice 1d6} babaus, {@dice 1d4} {@creature chasme||chasmes}, or one {@creature marilith}. A summoned demon apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of the molydeus, acts as an ally of the molydeus, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or the molydeus dies, or until the molydeus dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Demonic Shadows
entries: The nabassu darkens the area around its body in a 10-foot radius. Nonmagical light can't illuminate this area of dim light.

trait.name: Devour Soul
entries: A nabassu can eat the soul of a creature it has killed within the last hour, provided that creature is neither a construct nor an undead. The devouring requires the nabassu to be within 5 feet of the corpse for at least 10 minutes, after which it gains a number of Hit Dice ({@dice d8}s) equal to half the creature's number of Hit Dice. Roll those dice, and increase the nabassu's hit points by the numbers rolled. For every 4 Hit Dice the nabassu gains in this way, its attacks deal an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage on a hit. The nabassu retains these benefits for 6 days. A creature devoured by a nabassu can be restored to life only by a {@spell desig} spell.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The nabassu té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The nabassu's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The nabassu uses its Soul-Stealing Gaze and fa dos atacs: one with its claws and one with its bite.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}32 ({@damage 4d12 + 6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Soul-Stealing Gaze
entries: The nabassu targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the nabassu and isn't a construct or an undead, ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 16} or reduce its punts de vida màxims by 13 ({@dice 2d12}) damage and give the nabassu an equal number of temporary hit points. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. The target dies if its punts de vida màxims is reduced to 0, and if the target is a humanoid, it immediately rises as a {@creature ghoul} under the nabassu's control.

monster.name: Nagpa
idiomes: Common plus up to five other languages

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The nagpa és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 15. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 20} salvada de conjur, {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). A nagpa has the following wizard spells prepared:

spells: {@spell protegir del bé i del mal}

trait.name: Corruption
entries: Com a acció bonus, the nagpa targets one creature it can see within 90 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 20}. An evil creature makes the save with disadvantage. Si falla, the target is {@condition fascinat} by the nagpa until the start of the nagpa's next turn. Si supera, the target becomes immune to the nagpa's Corruption for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Paralysis {@recharge}
entries: Com a acció bonus, the nagpa forces each creature within 30 feet of it to succeed on a {@dc 20} Saviesa saving throw or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. Un objectiu {@condition paralitzat} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Undead and constructs are immune to this effect.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) de dany contundent.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Diabolical Sense
entries: The narzugon has advantage on Saviesa (Percepció) checks made to perceive good-aligned creatures.

trait.name: Infernal Tack
entries: The narzugon wears spurs that are part of infernal tack, which allow it to summon its {@creature nightmare} companion.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The narzugon té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The narzugon uses its Infernal Command or Terrifying Command. It also makes three hellfire lance attacks.

action.name: Hellfire Lance
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany de foc. If this damage kills a creature, the creature's soul rises from the River Styx as a lemure in Avernus in {@dice 1d4} hours.

If the creature isn't revived before then, only a {@spell desig} spell or killing the lemure and casting resurrecció veritable on the creature's original body can restore it to life. Constructs and devils are immune to this effect.

action.name: Infernal Command
entries: Each ally of the narzugon within 60 feet of it can't be {@condition fascinat} or {@condition acovardit} until the end of the narzugon's next turn.

action.name: Terrifying Command
entries: Each creature that isn't a fiend within 60 feet of the narzugon that can hear ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 17} or become {@condition acovardit} of it durant 1 minut.

A creature can repeat the saving throw al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success. A creature that makes a successful saving throw is immune to this narzugon's Terrifying Command for 24 hours.

action.name: Healing (1/Dia)
entries: The narzugon, or one creature it touches, regains up to 100 hit points.

trait.name: Annihilating Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the nightwalker ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21} or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany necròtic and grant the nightwalker advantage on attack rolls against it until the start of the creature's next turn. Undead are immune to this aura.

trait.name: Life Eater
entries: A creature reduced to 0 hit points from damage dealt by the nightwalker dies and can't be revived by any means short of a {@spell desig} spell.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The nightwalker uses Enervating Focus twice, or it uses Enervating Focus and Finger of Doom, if available.

action.name: Enervating Focus
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 5d8 + 6}) de dany necròtic. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21} or its punts de vida màxims is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. Aquesta reducció dura fins que l'objectiu faci un Descans Llarg.

action.name: Finger of Doom {@recharge}
entries: The nightwalker points at one creature it can see within 300 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 21} or take 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany necròtic and become {@condition acovardit} until the end of the nightwalker's next turn. While {@condition acovardit} in this way, the creature is also {@condition paralitzat}. If a target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the nightwalker's Finger of Doom for the next 24 hours.

monster.name: Nupperibo
senses: visió a cegues 10 peus (sense visió més enllà)

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

idiomes: understands Infernal però no pot parlar

trait.name: Cloud of Vermin
entries: Any creature, other than a devil, that starts its turn within 20 feet of the nupperibo ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 11}. A creature within the areas of two or more nupperibos makes the saving throw with disadvantage. On a failure, the creature takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Hunger-Driven
entries: In els Nou Inferns, the nupperibos can flawlessly track any creature that has taken damage from any nupperibo's Cloud of Vermin within the previous 24 hours.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

monster.name: Oaken Bolter

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

idiomes: understands one language of its creator però no pot parlar

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The oaken bolter té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The oaken bolter makes two lancing bolt attacks or one lancing bolt attack and one harpoon attack.

action.name: Lancing Bolt
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Harpoon
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 50/200 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 12} per escapar). While {@condition grappled} in this way, a creature's speed isn't reduced, but it can move only in directions that bring it closer to the oaken bolter. A creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany tallant if it escapes from the grapple or if it tries and fails. Com a acció bonus, the oaken bolter can pull a creature {@condition grappled} by it 20 feet closer. The oaken bolter can grapple only one creature at a time.

action.name: Explosive Bolt {@recharge 5}
entries: The oaken bolter launches an explosive charge at a point within 120 feet. Each creature within 20 feet of that point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 15}. Qui falli rep 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

monster.name: Oblex Spawn
senses: visió a cegues 60 peus (blind beyond this distance)

trait.name: Amorf
entries: The oblex pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema.

trait.name: Aversion to Fire
entries: Si the oblex rep dany de foc té desavantatge a tirades d'impactar i d'habilitat fins el final del seu proper torn.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany psíquic.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The ogre fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany contundent, and the ogre can push the target 5 feet away if the target is Huge or smaller.

action.name: Block the Path
entries: Until the start of the ogre's next turn, attack rolls against the ogre have disadvantage, it has advantage on the attack roll it makes for an opportunity attack, and that attack deals an extra 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany contundent on a hit. Also, each enemy that tries to move out of the ogre's abast without teleporting ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 14} or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of the ogre's next turn.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Bolt Launcher
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 120/480 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d10 + 1}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Chain Sweep
entries: The ogre swings its chain, and every creature within 10 feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 14}. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany contundent i està {@condition enderrocat}. Si supera en rep la meitat i no està {@condition enderrocat}.

action.name: Chain Smash {@recharge}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 14}. On a failure the target is {@condition inconscient} durant 1 minut. The {@condition inconscient} target repeats the saving throw if it takes damage and al final de cada torn seu, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Howdah
entries: The ogre carries a compact fort on its back. Up to four Small creatures can ride in the fort without squeezing. To make a melee attack against a target within 5 feet of the ogre, they must use spears or weapons with reach. Creatures in the fort have three-quarters cover against attacks and effects from outside it. If the ogre dies, creatures in the fort are placed in unoccupied spaces within 5 feet of the ogre.

action.name: Maça
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The oinoloth's és Saviesa ({@dc 16} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Bringer of Plagues {@recharge 5}
entries: Com a acció bonus, the oinoloth blights the area within 30 feet of it. The blight lasts for 24 hours. While blighted, all normal plants in the area wither and die, and the number of hit points restored by a spell to a creature in that area is halved.

Furthermore, when a creature moves into the blighted area or starts its turn there, that creature ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16}. Si supera, the creature is immune to the oinoloth's Bringer of Plagues for the next 24 hours. Si falla, rep 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany necròtic i està {@condition emmetzinat}.

The {@condition emmetzinat} creature can't regain hit points. After every 24 hours that elapse, the {@condition emmetzinat} creature can repeat the saving throw. Si falla, the creature's punts de vida màxims is reduced by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). This reduction lasts until the poison ends, and the target dies if its punts de vida màxims is reduced to 0. The poison ends after the creature successfully saves against it three times.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The oinoloth té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The oinoloth's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The oinoloth uses its Transfixing Gaze and fa dos atacs d'Urpa.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Corrupted Healing {@recharge}
entries: The oinoloth touches una criatura voluntària within 5 feet of it. The target regains all its hit points. In addition, the oinoloth can end one disease on the target or remove one of the following conditions from it: {@condition encegat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition paralitzat}, o {@condition emmetzinat}. The target then gains 1 level of {@condition exhaust}, and its punts de vida màxims is reduced by 7 ({@dice 2d6}). This reduction can be removed only by a {@spell desig} spell or by casting {@spell restabliment superior} on the target three times within the same hour. The target dies if its punts de vida màxims is reduced to 0.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: The oinoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Transfixing Gaze
entries: The oinoloth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16} against this magic or be {@condition fascinat} until the end of the oinoloth's next turn. While {@condition fascinat} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained}. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the oinoloth's gaze for the next 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Orcus's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 23} salvada de conjur, {@hit 15} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Wand of Orcus
entries: The wand has 7 charges, and any of its properties that require a saving throw have a save DC of 18. While holding it, Orcus can use an action to cast {@spell animar els morts}, {@spell plaga}, o {@spell parlar amb els morts}. Alternatively, he can expend 1 or more of the wand's charges to cast one of the following spells from it: {@spell cercle de la mort} (1 charge), {@spell dit de la mort} (1 charge), or {@spell paraula de poder matar} (2 charges). The wand regains {@dice 1d4 + 3} charges daily at dawn.

While holding the wand, Orcus can use an action to conjure undead creatures whose combined average hit points don't exceed 500. These undead magically rise up from the ground or otherwise form in unoccupied spaces within 300 feet of Orcus and obey his commands until they are destroyed or until he dismisses them as an action. Once this property of the wand is used, the property can't be used again until the next dawn.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Orcus falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Orcus té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Orcus's són màgics.

trait.name: Master of Undeath
entries: When Orcus casts {@spell animar els morts} or {@spell crear no-morts}, he chooses the level at which the spell is cast, and the creatures created by the spells remain under his control indefinitely. Additionally, he can cast crear no-morts even when it isn't night.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Orcus makes two Wand of Orcus attacks.

action.name: Wand of Orcus
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 19} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) de dany contundent mes 13 ({@damage 2d12}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) de dany perforant mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de verí.

legendary.name: Cua
entries: Orcus makes one atac de cua.

legendary.name: A Taste of Undeath
entries: Orcus casts mà morta (17th level).

legendary.name: Creeping Death (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Orcus chooses a point on the ground that he can see within 100 feet of him. A cylinder of swirling necrotic energy 60 feet tall and with a 10-foot radius rises from that point and lasts until the end of Orcus's next turn. Creatures in that area have vulnerability to necrotic damage.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Invisibility Field
entries: The orthon can use a bonus action to become {@condition invisible}. Any equipment the orthon wears or carries is also {@condition invisible} as long as the equipment is on its person. This invisibility ends immediately after the orthon makes an attack roll or is hit by an attack.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The orthon té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Infernal Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d4 + 6}) de dany tallant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat. On a failure, the target is {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu {@condition emmetzinat} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament qui superi.

action.name: Brass Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) de dany perforant, mes one of the following effects:

items.name: 1. Acid
items.entry: L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17}, taking an additional 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany d'àcid; si supera, en rep la meitat.

items.name: 2. Blindness (1/Dia)
items.entry: The target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany radiant. In addition, the target and all other creatures within 20 feet of it must each make a successful {@dc 17} Destresa saving throw or be {@condition encegat} until the end of the orthon's next turn.

items.name: 3. Concussion
items.entry: The target and each creature within 20 feet of it ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17}. Qui falli rep 13 ({@damage 2d12}) de dany de tro; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: 4. Entanglement
items.entry: The target must make a successful {@dc 17} Destresa saving throw or be {@condition restrained} for 1 hour by strands of sticky webbing. A {@condition restrained} creature can escape by using an action to make a successful {@dc 17} Destresa or Força check. Any creature other than an orthon that touches the {@condition restrained} creature must make a successful {@dc 17} Destresa saving throw or become similarly {@condition restrained}.

items.name: 5. Paralysis (1/Dia)
items.entry: The target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany elèctric and must make a successful {@dc 17} Constitució saving throw or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu {@condition paralitzat} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

items.name: 6. Tracking
items.entry: For the next 24 hours, the orthon knows the direction and distance to the target, as long as it's on the same plane of existence. If the target is on a different plane, the orthon knows which one, but not the exact location there.

reaction.name: Explosive Retribution
entries: When it is reduced to 15 hit points or fewer, the orthon causes itself to explode. All other creatures within 30 feet of it must each make a {@dc 17} Destresa saving throw. Qui falli rep 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de foc mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de tro; qui superi, en rep la meitat. This explosion destroys the orthon, its infernal dagger, and its brass crossbow.

trait.name: Fiery Death and Rebirth
entries: When the phoenix dies, it explodes. Each creature within 60-feet of it ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat. The fire ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't worn or carried.

The explosion destroys the phoenix's body and leaves behind an egg-shaped cinder that weighs 5 pounds. The cinder is blazing hot, dealing 21 ({@damage 6d6}) de dany de foc to any creature that touches it, though no more than once per round. The cinder is immune to all damage, and after {@dice 1d6} days, it hatches a new phoenix.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The phoenix pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema. Any creature that touches the phoenix or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc. In addition, the phoenix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc. With a touch, the phoenix can also ignite flammable objects that aren't worn or carried (no requereix acció).

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The phoenix no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The phoenix desprèn llum forta en un radi de 60 peus i llum tènue uns 30 peus adicionals.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the phoenix falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The phoenix fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The phoenix fa dos atacs: one with its beak and one with its fiery talons.

action.name: Bec
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) de dany de foc. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Fins que una criatura, com a acció, apagui el foc, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de foc a l'inici de cada torn seu.

action.name: Fiery Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) de dany de foc.

legendary.name: Peck
entries: The phoenix makes one beak attack.

legendary.name: Moure
entries: The phoenix moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Swoop (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The phoenix moves up to its speed and attacks with its fiery talons.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El abishai pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The abishai té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The abishai's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The abishai can use its Presència Aterradora. It also fa tres atacs: one with its morningstar, one with its claw, and one with its bite.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany perforant mes 38 ({@damage 7d10}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Each creature of the abishai's choice that is within 120 feet and aware of ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 18} o estar {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si la criatura supera la salvació o l'efecte acaba prematurament, la criatura és immune a abishai's Presència Aterradora durant les properes 24 hores.

action.name: Incite Fanaticism
entries: The abishai chooses up to four of its allies within 60 feet of it that can see it. For 1 minute, each of those allies makes attack rolls with advantage and can't be {@condition acovardit}.

action.name: Power of the Dragon Queen
entries: The abishai targets one dragon it can see within 120 feet of it. The dragon ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 18}. A chromatic dragon makes this save with disadvantage. Si supera, the target is immune to the abishai's Power of the Dragon Queen for 1 hour. Si falla, the target is {@condition fascinat} by the abishai for 1 hour. While {@condition fascinat} in this way, the target regards the abishai as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. This effect ends if the abishai or its companions deal damage to the target.

monster.name: Retriever

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

idiomes: and Undercommon però no pot parlar

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The retriever és Saviesa ({@dc 13} salvació de conjur). The retriever can innately cast the following spells, sense que calguin components materials.

3e: {@spell saltar de pla} (only self and up to one incapacitated creature which is considered willing for the spell)

trait.name: Faultless Tracker
entries: The retriever is given a quarry by its master. The quarry can be a specific creature or object the master is personally acquainted with, or it can be a general type of creature or object the master has seen before. The retriever knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The retriever can have only one such quarry at a time. The retriever also always knows the location of its master.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The retriever makes two foreleg attacks and uses its force or paralyzing beam once, if available.

action.name: Foreleg
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Force Beam
entries: The retriever targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany de força; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Paralyzing Beam {@recharge 5}
entries: The retriever targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18} or be {@condition paralitzat} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu {@condition paralitzat} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.
If the {@condition paralitzat} creature is Medium or smaller, the retriever can pick it up as part of the retriever's move and walk or climb with it at full speed.

trait.name: Rancid Degeneration
entries: Al final de cada torn de the troll, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany necròtic, unless the troll has taken acid or fire damage since the end of its last turn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The troll fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany necròtic.

monster.name: Rutterkin
idiomes: understands Abyssal però no pot parlar

trait.name: Crippling Temor
entries: When a creature that isn't a demon starts its turn within 30 feet of three or more rutterkins, it ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 11}. The creature has disadvantage on the save if it's within 30 feet of six or more rutterkins. Si supera, the creature is immune to the Crippling Fear of all rutterkins for 24 hours. Si falla, the creature becomes {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. While {@condition acovardit} in this way, the creature is {@condition restrained}. Al final de cada torn de the {@condition acovardit} creature, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) de dany perforant. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} against disease or become {@condition emmetzinat}. At the end of each long rest, the {@condition emmetzinat} target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target is reduced to 0 hit points while {@condition emmetzinat} in this way, it dies and instantly transforms into a living {@creature abyssal wretch|mtf}. The transformation of the body can be undone only by a {@spell desig} spell. (See notes)

monster.name: Sacred Statue
idiomes: the languages the eidolon knew in life

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si statue es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal statue.

trait.name: Ghostly Inhabitant
entries: The {@creature eidolon|MTF} that enters the sacred statue remains inside it until the statue es queda a 0 punts de vida, the eidolon uses a bonus action to move out of the statue, or the eidolon is turned or forced out by an effect such as the {@spell dissipar el bé i el mal} spell. When the eidolon leaves the statue, it apareix en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of the statue.

trait.name: Inert
entries: When not inhabited by an {@creature eidolon|MTF}, the statue is an object.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The statue makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}43 ({@damage 6d12 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Rock
