entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}37 ({@damage 6d10 + 4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The shadow dancer té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition fascinat} i no pot patir son màgicament

trait.name: Shadow Jump
entries: Com a acció bonus, the shadow dancer can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Both the space it teleports from and the space it teleports to must be in dim light or darkness. The shadow dancer can use this ability between the weapon attacks of another action it takes.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The shadow dancer makes three spiked chain attacks.

action.name: Spiked Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Destresa amb {@dc 14} o suffer one additional effect of the shadow dancer's choice:

items: The target is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Durant aquesta presa, l'objectiu també està {@condition restrained}, and the shadow dancer can't grapple another target.
The target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany necròtic.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The sibriex's és Saviesa ({@dc 21} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Contamination
entries: The sibriex emits an aura of corruption 30 feet in every direction. Plants that aren't creatures wither in the aura, and the ground in it is terreny difícil for other creatures. Any creature that starts its turn in the aura ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 20} or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí. A creature that succeeds on the save is immune to this sibriex's Contamination for 24 hours.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the sibriex falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The sibriex té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sibriex uses Squirt Bile once and fa tres atacs using its chain, bite, or both.

action.name: Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d12 + 7}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Squirt Bile
entries: The sibriex targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20} or take 35 ({@damage 10d6}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Warp Creature
entries: The sibriex targets up to three creatures it can see within 120 feet of it. Each target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 20}. Qui superi becomes immune to this sibriex's Warp Creature. Si falla, the target is {@condition emmetzinat}, which causes it to also gain 1 level of {@condition exhaust}. While {@condition emmetzinat} in this way, the target must repeat the saving throw a l'inici de cada torn seu. Three successful saves against the poison end it, and ending the poison removes any levels of {@condition exhaust} caused by it. Each failed save causes the target to suffer another level of {@condition exhaust}. Once the target reaches 6 levels of {@condition exhaust}, it dies and instantly transforms into a living {@creature abyssal wretch|mtf} under the sibriex's control. The transformation of the body can be undone only by a {@spell desig} spell.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell
entries: The sibriex casts a spell.

legendary.name: Spray Bile
entries: The sibriex uses Squirt Bile.

legendary.name: Warp (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The sibriex uses Warp Creature.

variant.name: Flesh Warping
entries: Creatures that encounter a sibriex can be twisted beyond recognition. Whenever a creature fails a saving throw against the sibriex's Warp Creature effect, you can roll percentile dice and consult the Flesh Warping table to determine an additional effect, which vanishes when Warp Creature ends on the creature. If the creature transforms into an abyssal wretch, the effect becomes a permanent feature of that body.

A creature can willingly submit to flesh warping, an agonizing process that takes at least 1 hour while the creature stays within 30 feet of the sibriex. At the end of the process, roll once on the table (or choose one effect) to determine how the creature is transformed permanently.

entries.caption: Flesh Warping
rows: The color of the target's hair, eyes, and skin becomes blue, red, yellow, or patterned.
The target's eyes push out of its head at the end of stalks.
The target's hands grow claws, which can be used as daggers.
One of the target's legs grows longer than the other, reducing its walking speed by 10 feet.
The target's eyes become beacons, filling a 15-foot cone with dim light when they are open.
A pair of wings, either feathered or leathery, sprout from the target's back, granting it una velocitat de vol de 30 peus.
The target's ears tear free from its head and scurry away; the target is {@condition eixordat}.
Two of the target's teeth turn into tusks.
The target's skin becomes scabby, granting it a +1 bonus to AC but reducing its Carisma by 2 (to a minimum of 1).
The target's arms and legs switch places, preventing the target from moving unless it crawls.
The target's arms become tentacles with fingers on the ends, increasing its abast by 5 feet.
The target's legs grow incredibly long and springy, increasing its walking speed by 10 feet.
The target grows a whiplike tail, which it can use as a {@item whip|phb}.
The target's eyes turn black, and it gains darkvision out to a range of 120 feet.
The target swells, tripling its weight.
The target becomes thin and skeletal, halving its weight.
The target's head doubles in size.
The target's ears become wings, giving it una velocitat de vol de 5 peus.
The target's body becomes unusually brittle, causing the target to have vulnerability to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
The target grows another head, causing it to have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition fascinat}, {@condition acovardit}, o {@condition atordit}.

monster.name: Skulk
idiomes: understands Common però no pot parlar

trait.name: Fallible Invisibility
entries: The skulk is {@condition invisible}. This invisibility can be circumvented by three things:

items: The skulk appears as a drab, smooth-skinned humanoid if its reflection can be seen in a mirror or on another surface.
The skulk appears as a dim, translucent form in the light of a candle made of fat rendered from a corpse whose identity is unknown.
Humanoid children, aged 10 and under, can see through this invisibility.

trait.name: Trackless
entries: The skulk leaves no tracks to indicate where it has been or where it's headed.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) de dany tallant. If the skulk has advantage on the attack roll, the target also takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany necròtic.

monster.name: Skull Lord
idiomes: all the languages it knew in life

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The skull lord és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 13. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Carisma ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The skul. Coneix els encanteris de fetiller següents:

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the skull lord falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Master of the Grave
entries: While within 30 feet of the skull lord, any undead ally of the skull lord makes saving throws with advantage, and that ally regains {@dice 1d6} hit points whenever it starts its turn there.

trait.name: Evasió
entries: If the skull lord is subjected to an effect that allows it salvar per Destresa to take only half the damage, the skull lord instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The skull lord makes three bone staff attacks.

action.name: Bone Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany necròtic.

legendary.name: Bone Staff (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The skull lord makes a bone staff attack.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The skull lord casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Moure
entries: The skull lord moves up to its speed sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat.

legendary.name: Convocar No-Mort (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Up to five {@creature skeleton||skeletons} or {@creature zombie||zombies} appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the skull lord and remain until destroyed. Undead summoned in this way roll initiative and act in the next available turn. The skull lord can have up to five undead summoned by this ability at a time.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The soul monger és Intel·ligència ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The soul monger té avantatge a salvar contra la condició {@condition fascinat} i no pot patir son màgicament

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The soul monger té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Soul Thirst
entries: When the soul monger reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the soul monger can gain temporary hit points equal to half the creature's punts de vida màxims. While the soul monger has temporary hit points from this ability, it has advantage on attack rolls.

trait.name: Weight of Ages
entries: Any beast or humanoid, other than a shadar-kai, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the soul monger has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The soul monger makes two phantasmal dagger attacks.

action.name: Phantasmal Daga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 4d4 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 19 ({@damage 3d12}) de dany necròtic, and the target has disadvantage on saving throws until the start of the soul monger's next turn.

action.name: Wave of Weariness {@recharge 4}
entries: The soul monger emits weariness in a 60-foot cube. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 45 ({@damage 10d8}) de dany psíquic and suffers 1 level of {@condition exhaust}. Si supera, it takes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany psíquic.

trait.name: Moviment Incorpori
entries: The troll pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Rep 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el seu torn dins d'un objecte.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The troll regains 10 hit points a l'inici de cada torn seu. If the troll takes psychic or force damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The troll fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d10 + 3}) de dany psíquic, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Saviesa amb {@dc 15} o estar {@condition atordit} durant 1 minut. L'objectiu {@condition atordit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) de dany psíquic.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The eladrin's és Saviesa ({@dc 16} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Pas de Fata {@recharge 4}
entries: Com a acció bonus, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Joyful Presence
entries: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16}. Si falla, the creature is {@condition fascinat} durant 1 minut. Si supera, the creature becomes immune to any eladrin's Joyful Presence for 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the {@condition fascinat} creature, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The eladrin té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks. The eladrin can cast one spell in place of one of these attacks.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany psíquic, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany psíquic si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany psíquic.

trait.name: Aura of Madness
entries: Creatures within 20 feet of the grue that aren't aberrations have disadvantage on saving throws, as well as on attack rolls against creatures other than a star spawn grue.

action.name: Confounding Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Saviesa amb {@dc 10} o attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of the grue's next turn.

trait.name: Psychic Mirror
entries: If the hulk takes psychic damage, each creature within 10 feet of the hulk takes that damage instead; the hulk takes none of the damage. In addition, the hulk's thoughts and location can't be discerned by magic.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The hulk makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, the target also takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany psíquic iha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17} or be {@condition atordit} until the end of the target's next turn.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Reaping Arms {@recharge 5}
entries: The hulk makes a separate slam attack against each creature within 10 feet of it. Each creature that is hit must also succeed on a {@dc 17} Destresa saving throw or be knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The larva mage és Carisma ({@dc 16} salvada de conjur, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):
footerEntries: *3 beams, +3 bonus to each damage roll

trait.name: Return to Worms
entries: When the larva mage is reduced to 0 hit points, it breaks apart into a {@creature swarm of insects} in the same space. Unless the swarm is destroyed, the larva mage reforms from it 24 hours later.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 19} o be {@condition emmetzinat} fins el final del seu proper torn.

action.name: Plague of Worms {@recharge}
entries: Each creature other than a star spawn within 10 feet of the larva mage ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 19}. On a failure the target takes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany necròtic i està {@condition encegat} and {@condition restrained} by masses of swarming worms. The affected creature takes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) de dany necròtic at the start of each of the larva mage's turns. La criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

reaction.name: Feed on Weakness
entries: When a creature within 20 feet of the larva mage fails a saving throw, the larva mage gains 10 temporary hit points.

legendary.name: Cantrip (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The larva mage casts one cantrip.

legendary.name: Slam (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The larva mage makes one slam attack.

legendary.name: Feed (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Each creature {@condition restrained} by the larva mage's Plague of Worms takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany necròtic, and the larva mage gains 6 temporary hit points.

trait.name: Ambush
entries: On the first round of each combat, the mangler has advantage on attack rolls against a creature that hasn't taken a turn yet.

trait.name: Sigil de l'Ombra
entries: Quan és dins de llum tènua o de foscor the mangler can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The mangler fa dos atacs d'Urpa.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant. If the attack roll has advantage, the target also takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Flurry of Claws {@recharge 4}
entries: The mangler makes six claw attacks against un objectiu. Either before or after these attacks, it can move up to its speed as a bonus action sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat.

trait.name: Out-of-Phase Movement
entries: The seer pot moure's a través d'altres criatures i objectes com si fossin terreny difícil. Each creature it moves through takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany psíquic; no creature can take this damage more than un cop per torn. The seer takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de força si acaba el torn dins d'un objecte.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The seer makes two comet staff attacks or uses Psychic Orb twice.

action.name: Comet Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) de dany contundent mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany psíquic, o 10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) de dany contundent mes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany psíquic, si s'usa amb dues mans, i l'objectiu ha de superar una salvada de Constitució amb {@dc 19} o be {@condition incapacitat} fins el final del seu proper torn.

action.name: Psychic Orb
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 11} a impactar, range 120 feet, un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany psíquic.

action.name: Collapse Distance {@recharge}
entries: The seer warps space around a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. That creature ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 19}. Si falla, the target, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, is magically teleported up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space the seer can see, and all other creatures within 10 feet of the target's original space each takes 39 ({@damage 6d12}) de dany psíquic. Si supera, the target takes 19 ({@damage 3d12}) de dany psíquic.

reaction.name: Bend Space
entries: When the seer would be hit by an attack, it teleports, exchanging positions with another star spawn it can see within 60 feet of it. The other star spawn is hit by the attack instead.

monster.name: Steel Predator
idiomes: understands Modron and the language of its owner però no pot parlar

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The steel predator és Saviesa. The steel predator pot llançar els següents conjurs innatament sense requerir components

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The steel predator té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The steel predator's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The steel predator fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claw.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Stunning Roar {@recharge 5}
entries: The steel predator emits a roar en un con de 60 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 19}. Qui falli rep 27 ({@damage 5d10}) de dany de tro, drops everything it's holding, i està {@condition atordit} durant 1 minut. Qui superi en rep la meitat. La criatura {@condition atordit} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament qui superi.

monster.name: Stone Cursed
idiomes: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Cunning Opportunist
entries: The stone cursed has advantage on the attack rolls of opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: Si stone cursed es mantè immòbil, és indistingible d'un normal statue.

action.name: Petrifying Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) de dany tallant if the attack roll had advantage. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12}, or it begins to turn to stone i està {@condition restrained} fins el final del seu proper torn. when it must repeat the saving throw. The effect ends if the second save is successful; otherwise the target is {@condition petrificat} for 24 hours.

monster.name: Stone Defender

immune.note: d'atacs no màgics que no siguin d'adamantí

idiomes: understands one language of its creator però no pot parlar

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While the stone defender remains motionless against an uneven earthen or stone surface, it is indistinguishable from that surface.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The stone defender té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent, and if the target is Large or smaller, it is knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

reaction.name: Intercept Attack
entries: In response to another creature within 5 feet of it being hit by an attack roll, the stone defender gives that creature a +5 bonus to its AC against that attack, potentially causing a miss. To use this ability, the stone defender must be able to see the creature and the attacker.

trait.name: Fearsome Presence
entries: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 16}. Si falla, the creature becomes {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si una criatura supera la salvada o aquest efecte se li cancel·la, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Fearsome Presence for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Pas de Fata {@recharge 4}
entries: Com a acció bonus, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The eladrin té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The eladrin makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de foc, o 15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de foc si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) de dany perforant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de foc.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: The eladrin adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the eladrin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Sword Wraith Commander
idiomes: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Martial Fury
entries: Com a acció bonus, the sword wraith can make one weapon attack, which deals an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany necròtic on a hit. If it does so, attack rolls against it have advantage fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

trait.name: Turning Defiance
entries: The sword wraith and any other sword wraiths within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The sword wraith makes two weapon attacks.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Call to Honor (1/Dia)
entries: To use this action, the sword wraith must have taken damage during the current combat. If the sword wraith can use this action, it gives itself advantage on attack rolls fins el final del seu proper torn. and {@dice 1d4 + 1} {@creature sword wraith warrior|mtf|sword wraith warriors} appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of it. The warriors last until they drop to 0 hit points, and they take their turns immediately after the commander's turn on the same initiative count.

monster.name: Sword Wraith Warrior
idiomes: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Martial Fury
entries: Com a acció bonus, the sword wraith can make one weapon attack. If it does so, attack rolls against it have advantage fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany perforant.

resist.note: while in dim light or darkness

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The Angry has advantage on Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition encegat}, {@condition fascinat}, {@condition eixordat}, {@condition acovardit}, {@condition atordit}, or knocked {@condition inconscient}.

trait.name: Rising Anger
entries: If another creature deals damage to the Angry, the Angry's attack rolls have advantage fins el final del seu proper torn. and the first time it hits with a hook attack on its next turn, the attack's target takes an extra 19 ({@damage 3d12}) de dany psíquic.
On its turn, the Angry has disadvantage on attack rolls if no other creature has dealt damage to it since the end of its last turn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The Angry makes two hook attacks.

action.name: Hook
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d12 + 3}) de dany perforant.

resist.note: while in dim light or darkness

trait.name: Life Hunger
entries: If a creature the Hungry can see regains hit points, the Hungry gains two benefits fins el final del seu proper torn. it has advantage on attack rolls, and its bite deals an extra 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany necròtic on a hit.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The Hungry fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) de dany necròtic.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) de dany tallant. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} ({@dc 16} per escapar) i està {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. While grappling a creature, the Hungry can't attack with its claws.

resist.note: while in dim light or darkness

trait.name: Psychic Leech
entries: A l'inici de cada torn de the Lonely, each creature within 5 feet of ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15} or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany psíquic.

trait.name: Thrives on Company
entries: The Lonely has advantage on attack rolls while it is within 30 feet of at least two other creatures. It otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The Lonely makes one harpoon arm attack and uses Sorrowful Embrace.

action.name: Harpoon Arm
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar) if it is a Large or smaller creature.
The Lonely has two harpoon arms and can grapple up to two creatures at once.

action.name: Sorrowful Embrace
entries: Each creature {@condition grappled} by the Lonely ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 15}. A creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany psíquic; si supera, en rep la meitat. In either case, the Lonely pulls each creature {@condition grappled} by it up to 30 feet straight toward it.

resist.note: while in dim light or darkness

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The Lost makes two arm spike attacks.

action.name: Arm Spike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Embrace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d10 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 14} per escapar) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition acovardit}, and it takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany psíquic al final de cada torn seu. The Lost can embrace only one creature at a time.

reaction.name: Tightening Embrace
entries: If the Lost takes damage while it has a creature {@condition grappled}, that creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany psíquic.

resist.note: while in dim light or darkness

trait.name: Wretched Estratègies de Manada
entries: The Wretched té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de Wretched's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus. The Wretched otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany perforant, and the Wretched attaches to the target. While attached, the Wretched can't attack, and at the start of each of the Wretched's turns, the target takes 6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany necròtic.

The attached Wretched moves with the target whenever the target moves, requiring none of the Wretched's movement. The Wretched can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement on its turn. A creature, including the target, can use its action to detach a Wretched.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de Titivilus's és Saviesa ({@dc 21} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Titivilus falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Titivilus té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Titivilus's són màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Titivilus recupera 10 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If he takes cold or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Titivilus dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Ventriloquism
entries: Whenever Titivilus speaks, he can choose a point within 60 feet; his voice emanates from that point.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Titivilus makes one sword attack and uses his Frightful Word once.

action.name: Silver Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany necròtic, o 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany necròtic si s'usa amb dues mans. If the target is a creature, its punts de vida màxims is reduced by an amount equal to half the necrotic damage it takes.

action.name: Frightful Word
entries: Titivilus targets one creature he can see within 10 feet of him. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 21} o estar {@condition acovardit} durant 1 minut. While {@condition acovardit} in this way, the target must take the Dash action and move away from Titivilus by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the Dash action. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: Titivilus magically teleports, along with any equipment he is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

action.name: Twisting Words
entries: Titivilus targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 21}. On a failure the target is {@condition fascinat} durant 1 minut. The {@condition fascinat} target can repeat the saving throw if Titivilus deals any damage to it. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to Titivilus's Twisting Words for 24 hours.

legendary.name: Assault (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Titivilus attacks with his silver sword or uses his Frightful Word.

legendary.name: Corrupting Guia
entries: Titivilus uses Twisting Words. Alternatively, he targets one creature {@condition fascinat} by him that is within 60 feet of him; that {@condition fascinat} target ha de salvar per Carisma amb {@dc 21}. On a failure, Titivilus decides how the target acts during its next turn.

legendary.name: Teleportació
entries: Titivilus uses his Teleport action.

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Ballesta Lleugera
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Defensa Closca
entries: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Força and Constitució saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is {@condition enderrocat}, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Destresa saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The tortle és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 4. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de druida preparats:

trait.name: Aguantar la Respiració
entries: The tortle can hold its breath for 1 hour.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany contundent, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Defensa Closca
entries: The tortle withdraws into its shell. Until it emerges, it gains a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Força and Constitució saving throws. While in its shell, the tortle is {@condition enderrocat}, its speed is 0 and can't increase, it has disadvantage on Destresa saving throws, it can't take reactions, and the only action it can take is a bonus action to emerge.

trait.name: Life Sense
entries: The mist can sense the location of any creature within 60 feet of it, unless that creature's type is construct or undead.

trait.name: Prohibició
entries: The mist can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

trait.name: Misty Form
entries: The mist can occupy another creature's space and vice versa. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can pass through it without squeezing. Each foot of movement in water costs it 2 extra feet, rather than 1 extra foot. The mist can't manipulate objects in any way that requires fingers or manual dexterity.

trait.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
entries: The mist takes 10 radiant damage whenever it starts its turn in sunlight. the mist té desavantatge quan li toca llum solar and ability checks.

action.name: Drenar Vida
entries: The mist touches one creature in its space. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13} (undead and constructs automatically succeed), or it takes 10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany necròtic, the mist regains 10 hit points, and els punts de vida màxims de l'objectiu es redueixen tant com dany necròtic hagi rebut. Aquesta reducció dura fins que l'objectiu faci un Descans Llarg. The target dies if its punts de vida màxims is reduced to 0.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The troll has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Poison Splash
entries: When the troll takes damage of any type but psychic, each creature within 5 feet of the troll takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de verí.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The troll regains 10 hit points a l'inici de cada torn seu. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The troll fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de verí, and the creature is {@condition emmetzinat} until the start of the troll's next turn.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Venom Spray {@recharge}
entries: The troll slices itself with a claw, releasing a spray of poison in a 15-foot cube. The troll takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany tallant (this damage can't be reduced in any way). Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16}. Qui falli rep 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de verí i està {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. Si supera, la criatura rep la meitat del dany i no està {@condition emmetzinat}. Una criatura {@condition emmetzinat} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament qui superi.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The wastrilith pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Corrupt Water
entries: A l'inici de cada torn de the wastrilith, exposed water within 30 feet of it is befouled. Underwater, this effect lightly obscures the area until a current clears it away. Water in containers remains corrupted until it evaporates.

A creature that consumes this foul water or swims in it ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 18}. Si supera, the creature is immune to the foul water for 24 hours. Si falla, rep 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de verí i està {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. At the end of this time, the {@condition emmetzinat} creature must repeat the saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany de verí i està {@condition emmetzinat} until it finishes a long rest.
If another demon drinks the foul water com a acció, it gains 11 ({@dice 2d10}) temporary hit points.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The wastrilith té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Undertow
entries: As a bonus action when the wastrilith is underwater, it can cause all water within 60 feet of it to be terreny difícil for other creatures fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The wastrilith uses Grasping Spout and fa tres atacs: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d12 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Grasping Spout
entries: The wastrilith magically launches a spout of water at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 17}, and it has disadvantage if it's underwater. Si falla, rep 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) de dany d'àcid and is pulled up to 60 feet toward the wastrilith. Si supera en rep la meitat and isn't pulled.

monster.name: Water Elemental Myrmidon
idiomes: one language of its creator's choice

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The myrmidon's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The myrmidon makes three trident attacks.

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany perforant, o 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany perforant si s'usa a dues mans per un atac cos a cos.

action.name: Freezing Strikes {@recharge}
entries: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany de fred. A target that is hit by one or more of these attacks has its speed reduced by 10 feet until the end of the myrmidon's next turn.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: El abishai pot veure a través de la foscor màgica amb la seva visió de foscor.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The abishai té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The abishai's són màgics.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: A l'inici del seu torn, the abishai can gain advantage on all atac armat cos a cos rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage fins a l'inici del seu següent torn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The abishai fa dos atacs: one with its longsword and one with its claw.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant mes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany de fred.

reaction.name: Vicious Reprisal
entries: In response to taking damage, the abishai makes a bite attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it. If no creature is within reach, the abishai moves up to half its speed toward an enemy it can see, sense provocar atacs d'oportunitat.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The eladrin és Intel·ligència ({@dc 16} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Pas de Fata {@recharge 4}
entries: Com a acció bonus, the eladrin can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The eladrin té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Sorrowful Presence
entries: Any non-eladrin creature that starts its turn within 60 feet of the eladrin ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 13}. Si falla, the creature is {@condition fascinat} durant 1 minut. While {@condition fascinat} in this way, the creature has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws. La criatura {@condition fascinat} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si una criatura supera la salvada o aquest efecte se li cancel·la, the creature is immune to any eladrin's Sorrowful Presence for the next 24 hours.
Whenever the eladrin deals damage to the {@condition fascinat} creature, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany tallant, o 5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Frigid Rebuke
entries: When the eladrin takes damage from a creature the eladrin can see within 60 feet of it, the eladrin can force that creature to succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitució saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de fred.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The yagnoloth's és Saviesa ({@dc 16} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The yagnoloth té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The yagnoloth's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The yagnoloth makes one massive arm attack and one electrified touch attack, or it makes one massive arm attack and teleports before or after the attack.

action.name: Electrified Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d8}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Massive Arm
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d12 + 4}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16} or is {@condition atordit} until the end of the yagnoloth's next turn.

action.name: Life Leech
entries: The yagnoloth touches one {@condition incapacitat} creature within 15 feet of it. The target takes 36 ({@damage 7d8 + 4}) de dany necròtic, and the yagnoloth gains temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 16}, or se li redueixen tants punts de vida màxims com dany hagi rebut. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest, and the target dies if its punts de vida màxims is reduced to 0.

action.name: Battlefield Cunning {@recharge 4}
entries: Up to two allied yugoloths within 60 feet of the yagnoloth that can hear it can use their reactions to make one melee attack each.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: The yagnoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Yeenoghu's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 17} salvada de conjur, {@hit 9} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Yeenoghu falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Yeenoghu té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Yeenoghu's són màgics.

trait.name: Enfurismar
entries: When Yeenoghu reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on his turn, Yeenoghu can take a bonus action to move up to half his speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Yeenoghu makes three flail attacks. If an attack hits, he can cause it to create an additional effect of his choice or at random (each effect can be used only once per Multiattack):
1. The attack deals an extra 13 ({@damage 2d12}) de dany contundent.
2. The target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17} or be {@condition paralitzat} until the start of Yeenoghu's next turn.
3. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 17} or be affected by the {@spell confusió} spell until the start of Yeenoghu's next turn.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 1d12 + 9}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d10 + 9}) de dany perforant.

legendary.name: Carregar
entries: Yeenoghu moves up to his speed.

legendary.name: Swat Away
entries: Yeenoghu makes a flail attack. If the attack hits, the target ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 24} or be pushed 15 feet in a straight line away from Yeenoghu. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls {@condition enderrocat}.

legendary.name: Savage (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Yeenoghu makes a bite attack against each creature within 10 feet of him.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The kruthik has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Estratègies de Manada
entries: The kruthik té avantatge a impactar una criatura que tingui un aliat de kruthik's no {@condition incapacitat} a 5 peus.

trait.name: Tuneladora
entries: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 2 1/2-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Stab
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Earth-Shaking Movement
entries: As a bonus action after moving at least 10 feet on the ground, the zaratan can send a shock wave through the ground in a 120-foot-radius circle centered on itself. That area becomes terreny difícil durant 1 minut. Each creature on the ground that is concentrating ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 25} or the creature's concentration is broken.

The shock wave deals 100 thunder damage to all structures in contact with the ground in the area. If a creature is near a structure that collapses, the creature might be buried; a creature within half the distance of the structure's height ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 25}. Si falla, rep 17 ({@damage 5d6}) de dany contundent, is knocked {@condition enderrocat}, and is trapped in the rubble. A trapped creature is {@condition restrained}, requiring a successful {@dc 20} Força (Atletisme) check as an action to escape. Another creature within 5 feet of the buried creature can use its action to clear rubble and grant advantage on the check. If three creatures use their actions in this way, the check is an automatic success. Si supera en rep la meitat and doesn't fall {@condition enderrocat} or become trapped.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si the zaratan falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de The zaratan's són màgics.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures (included in Earth-Shaking Movement).

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The zaratan fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its stomp.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d8 + 10}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Esclafar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d10 + 10}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Spit Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 120/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}31 ({@damage 6d8 + 10}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Spew Debris {@recharge 5}
entries: The zaratan exhales rocky debris in a 90-foot cube. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 25}. A creature takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) de dany contundent; si supera, en rep la meitat. A creature that fails the save by 5 or more is knocked {@condition enderrocat}.

legendary.name: Esclafar
entries: The zaratan makes one stomp attack.

legendary.name: Moure
entries: The zaratan moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Spit (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The zaratan uses Spit Rock.

legendary.name: Retract (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The zaratan retracts into its shell. Until it takes its Emerge action, it has resistance to all damage, and it is {@condition restrained}. The next time it takes a legendary action, it must take its Revitalize or Emerge action.

legendary.name: Revitalize (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The zaratan can use this option only if it is retracted in its shell. It regains 52 ({@dice 5d20}) hit points. The next time it takes a legendary action, it must take its Emerge action.

legendary.name: Emerge (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: The zaratan emerges from its shell and uses Spit Rock. It can use this option only if it is retracted in its shell.

resist.note: d'atacs no màgics amb armes no platejades

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de Zariel's és Saviesa ({@dc 26} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):
will: {@spell ego alteració} (can become Medium when changing her appearance)
{@spell detectar el bé i el mal}

3e: {@spell dissipar el bé i el mal}

trait.name: Ulls de Diables
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede Zariel's darkvision.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Zariel's són màgics. When she hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany de foc (included in the weapon attacks below).

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Zariel falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Zariel té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: Zariel recupera 20 punts de toc a l'inici del seu torn. If she takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of her next turn. Zariel dies only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Zariel attacks twice with her longsword or with her javelins. She can substitute Horrid Touch for one of these attacks.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) de dany tallant mes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany de foc, o 19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) de dany tallant mes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany de foc si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) de dany perforant mes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Horrid Touch {@recharge 5}
entries: Zariel touches one creature within 10 feet of her. The target must succeed on a DC 26 Constitució saving throw or take 44 ({@damage 8d10}) de dany necròtic and be {@condition emmetzinat} durant 1 minut. While {@condition emmetzinat} in this way, the target is also {@condition encegat} and {@condition eixordat}. L'objectiu pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

action.name: Teleportació
entries: Zariel magically teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing and carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

legendary.name: Immolating Gaze (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Zariel turns her magical gaze toward one creature she can see within 120 feet of her and commands it to combust. The target ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 26} or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany de foc.

legendary.name: Teleportació
entries: Zariel uses her Teleport action.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Zuggtmoy's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 22} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Zuggtmoy falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Zuggtmoy té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Armament Màgic
entries: Els atacs armats de Zuggtmoy's són màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Zuggtmoy makes three pseudòpode attacks.

action.name: Pseudòpode
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) de dany contundent mes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany de verí.

action.name: Infestació Spores (3/Dia)
entries: Zuggtmoy releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on her, and it lingers durant 1 minut. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 19}. Si supera, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. Si falla, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy and also gains a random form of madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of Zuggtmoy table) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a type of creature that can be (see the "Myconids" entry in the Monster Manual).

action.name: Mind Control Spores {@recharge 5}
entries: Zuggtmoy releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on her, and it lingers durant 1 minut. Humanoids and beasts in the cloud when it appears, or that enter it later, ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 19}. Si supera, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. Si falla, the creature is infected with a disease called the influence of Zuggtmoy for 24 hours. While infected in this way, the creature is {@condition fascinat} by her and can't be reinfected by these spores.

reaction.name: Protective Thrall
entries: When Zuggtmoy is hit by an attack, one creature within 5 feet of Zuggtmoy that is {@condition fascinat} by her must use its reaction to be hit by the attack instead.

entries: One creature {@condition fascinat} by Zuggtmoy that she can see must use its reaction to move up to its speed as she directs or to make a weapon attack against a target that she designates.
